Tham la 'ab tu gnas par 'gyur te/ de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i glegres 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o//
'a ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang sprul pa de'ang lhun gyis grub cing bsgom pa mi mnga' ba dang/ mngon bar 'du mdzad pa la 'a bas mdzad de de bzhin
gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas sprul pa dag sngal to// spre'o le/ desngalapar bya'o snyam du ma dgengs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sprul pas 'dul ba'i sems can ja da par 'jig rten gyi khams/
'dzi dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs mdo pa brgya stong de dang de dag tu sems can yongs su sAn par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin ga shigs pa'i sbal pa de gang du bzhud do/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'dzing
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang pa'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du sku las 'od kha dog du ma pa/ kha dog tha dad
ba kha dog brgya stong pa ga phyung sta/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi ma snyad snang bar byed pa de'ang lhun gyis grub cing bsgum pa mi mnga' ba dang/ mngon par 'du
mdzad pa mi ma 'a bas mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dang/ skub 'phrin las te/ sku'i 'phrin las yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa nyung zad tsam zhig
nubya// bstan du zad kyi/ bskal ba las/ de bas lhag par brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'phrin las yongs su dag pa'i yon tan la bsngags pa mthar phyin par ]
ma nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khros ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i
bdag po lag na rdo rje la lha'i dang mi'i ma tog rnams kyis mngon bar gtor to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phyag ga yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gan
rdo rje'i sa bo la gzhag nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs ba'i gsang ba bstan pa 'di legs bar skyas ba legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs
pas kyang gnang zhing rjes su dgyes so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku'i gsang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////gsang ba ba'i bdag po
lag na rdo rjes/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skadatsus sbas so// zhi ba'i blo gros del de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang/
[pd/ ]gsung gi 'phrin las yongs su dag ba gang zhen/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rje kas par sangs
rgyas pa dang/ gang gi nub mo len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas tha na ya ga'i 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so// gsung
bar ma 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa na rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dbugs 'byung ba 'am/ drub pa ma mnga' 'o/
rnam par mi rtog go/ rnam par ma dpyod do// rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa med na lag ma 'byung sta/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam pa lnga yi tog/ rnam
bar ma dpyod/ rtog par ma mdzad/ rnam par rtog par ma mdzad/ ma gsung/ mi brjod/ gsung bar ma mdzad kyang/ sems can rnams 'di sum du sems te/
de bzhin gshegs pa na gsung ngo snyam mo// de bzhin gshags pa ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ mi ga'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rig par mi mang
kyang/ sems can yi ge lhur len ba rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs ba ni bdag cag la chos ston to// bdag cag ni de bzhin gshags pa'i chos bstan pa kun
shes so snyam mo// de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa ma rtog cing btang snyoms su mdzad do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshoms dang//
sgros dang/ zhal gyi dkan dang/ lcags dang/ zhal gyi sgo nas sgra 'byung ba'ang med la 'byung bar yang gragago/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ga sgra 'byung ba de na nam mkha'
las byang na/ sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ sgra 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ngo snyam mo/ dazhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni
rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan bar 'byung ste/ rnam ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mnyen pa'i gsung 'byung ba dang/ 'jam pa dang/ yid du 'ong pa dang/ yid
du 'thad pa dang/ dag pa dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ 'od gsal ba dang/ snyan zhing 'jebs pa dang/ mnyan par 'os pa dang/ mi tshugs pa dang/ snyan pa dang/ dul ba/
dang ma rtsub pa dang/ ma bsrung pa dang/ rab tu 'dul ba dang/ rnar snyan pa dang/ lus sim par byed pa dang/ soms tsham par byed pa dang/ snying dga' bar
byed pa dang do dga' khad skyod pa dang/ yongs su gdung ba med pa dang/ kun tu shes par bya ba dang/ rnam par rig par bya bdang/ rnam par gsal ba dang/ dag2
bar byed pa dang/ mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang/ kun shes par byed pa dang/ rnam par 'ag par byed pa dang/ rigs pa dang/ 'brel ba dang/ zlos pa'i skyon mad pa dang/
seng ge 'i sga'adrishugs can dang/ glang po che'i sgra skad dang/ 'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang/ klu'i dbang po'i sgra dang/ dri bra'i glu dbyangs dang/ bu ka la pang ka'i sgra dbyangs dang
tshangs ba'i sgra dbyangs sgrags pa dang/ shang shang te bu'i sgra dbyangs su grag pa dang/ lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs ltar sAn pa dang/ rnga'i sgra dang/ ma khengs pa dang/ ngamal
ba dang/ sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang/ tshig zur chag pa med pa dang/ ma tshang ba med pa dang/ ma zhum pa dang/ mi gzhan pa dang/ rab tu dga' bo dang/
khyab pa dang/ chub pa dang/ rgyan chags ba dang/ 'brel ba dang/ sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang/ dbang po thams cad rim par byed pa dang/ la sad pa
dang mi 'gyur ba dang/ ma rtobs pa dang/ 'khor kun tu grags pa dang/ 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa dang/ zhe sdong 'dul ba dang/ gti mug sal ba dang/
bdud tshar gcod pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'byung ba sta/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni yan lag drug/rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan par
u@#// 'byung dog/ zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing sems/
can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par ma bar mdzad kyang/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshags pa ni 'di gam du nga mdo'i snga 'am/ byangs kyis bsad ba'i snga ma/ lung du/
bstan pa'i sde ma gis su bcad pa'i snga 'am/ ched du brjod pa'i snga 'ag/ gleng gzhi'i snga 'am/ de lta bu byung ba'i snga 'am/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi snga 'am/ shin
tu rgyas pa'i sa'am/ rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi snga 'am/ gtan la bab par bstan pa'i snga 'am/ dpa 'am/ sngon gyi tshul lam/ rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde 'am//
kun tu bsnyad pa 'di ston to zhi 'am/ rab tu gsal bar mdzad de zhi ma/ rab tu shes par mdzad do zhe ma/ rab tu 'jog ga zhi 'am/ rnam par 'byed do zhi ma rnam par
'grel to zhi 'am/ brjod do zhi 'am/ yang dag par bsgrags par mdzad do snyam du ma dgongs so// de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa rtsa 'dra ba dge slong gi 'khor
ram/ dge slong ma'i 'khor ram/ dge bsnyen gyi 'khor ram/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor ram/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri ba dang/ lha ma yin dang/ rnam
mkha' lding dang/ ma bag cu dang/ lto 'bumen po'i 'khor yang rung ste/ der de dag gi dbang bo'i mi pa dang/ de dag tu 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos par dgengs par
'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pa do/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes kyang/ chos bstan pa de na phan tshun gyis nges pa'i rnag tha dad pa la gnod
bkod bar thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rag bar kun tu shes te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gagasang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan
yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa dag gi spyod pa tshad yod pa gsungs na/ sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes 'byung ba na sems can dbang po mthu chung ba rnams
gzud pa'i phyi'i bstan pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bstan gyi/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can gyi spyod pa ni tshad med/ sems can 'dod chags la spyod ba rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa/
de bskal patsam du bshad kyang/ de bas lhag par 'gyur ro/ zhe sdang la stod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang/ gti mug la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang/ sems can
chamanyam pa la sod pa rnams kyi spyod ba gang yin pa de dag bskal pa tsam du bstan kyang/ de dag re re'ang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i blo gros gal te de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku'i tshe tshad bskal pa brgyad stong du bzhugs pas/ sems can rnams la chos bstan pa gzhan gyi skabs mi dbye bar sems can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang/
de bzhin ga shegs pa'i sku tshe mthar thug par 'gyur gyi/ soms can gyi spyod pa lamathar thug pa gang yang med do// sems can rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes sems can gyi god
pa de tsam du tshad med ba de'ong/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshad dang ldan par ston to// zhi ba'iblo gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungan ji ltar spyod pa khong du chud par 'gyur pa
bzhin du sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la 'byung ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhiba'i blo gros sems can gang dag de
bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gagasang ba'i yo shos kyi rjes su zhugs pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byang bar mi shes kyi/ nam mkha' las 'byung bar
shes so// zhi ba'i blo gros sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes so snyam du khyed sogs na de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe no/ zhi
ba'i blo gros sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gtsug tor nas byung bar shes pa dang/ spyi gtsug nas byung bar shes pa dang/ dbu skra rnams las byung bar shes pa
dang/ phrag pa nas byung bar shes pa dang/ dpral ba dang/ smin mtshams dang/ mdzod spu dang/ stan dang/ snyan dang/ shangs dang/ 'gram pa dang zhal
dang/ mguranas byung bar shes pa dang/ de bzhin du dpung pa dang/ phyag dang/ sor mo dang/ jibs legs dang brang dang rgyab dang/ lte ba dang/
gsang ba'i gnas dang/ brla dang/ pus mo'i lha nga dang/ byin pa dang/ leng bu dang/ zhabs kyi mthil dang/ mtshan rnams dang/ dpa bud bzang po rnams dang/
su'i khung thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes pa'i sems can la drug yod do// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/
zhi ba'i blo gros mos pa ji lta ba dang/ yongs su snyan pa ji lta ba dang/ bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'bung bar shes kyang/ 'a ba'i glu/
gros de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma mnga' ste btang sogs ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo'i sil snyan gyi 'khrul 'khor de tsam du legs par gyur
ba bus ba gang dag la lag gis ma reg par rlung gis bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dag kyang yod de/ 'on kyang de la sgra 'byin pa/ra snga ba na gang yang song med// yongs su spang ba
@#// byas pa'i khyad par gyis sgra snyan pa'i ng 'byung ngo// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa'i shes pas bskod na/
'byung ste/ 'on kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa gsung 'byin par so ba'ang mi mnga' mod kyi/ sngon yongs su sbyang ba mdzad ba'i khud nga ra gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can
thachos cad kyi yul gyi rjes su 'jug par yang 'gyur ro// zha pa'iblo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na phrag cha'i sgra ni gzhan rnam par rig par byed par yang 'byung la/ de ni nang na'ang ma yin
phyi rol na'ang ma yin/ gnyis ka med pa las kyang m dmigs so// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par rig par byed
pa'i ng 'byung la/ de nanang na'ang ma yin/ phyi rol na'ang ma yin la/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmags so// zhi ba'i blo gros 'de lta ste/ dperan rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na
yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya ba yod red/ de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ sems can gang gi bsam ba ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra
ba'i sgra de las 'byung yang nor bu rin po che dan+ti rnam par mi rtog go/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'igasung rin po che lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa'i ng snying rje chen
po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ sems can gang ga bsam pa su 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar des shes kyang/ de la de bzhin ga shegs
pa na rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams na gsung dbyangs tshad med pa ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros gang zhig ga de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi tshad dam/ mthal gzung bar nus pa de ni kho bos lha dang bcas pa dang/ bdud
dang bcas pa dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa skya dgu dang/ lta dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes to/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i re 'di nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor
rung bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la brten nas dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher rab tu ston pa de
mjug tu phyin pa'i dus kyi tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'galagyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor ji srid cig tu rang du 'gro ba zhig
bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor dpag par bya'o snyam mo// de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi buchen po rang gastan gyi steng nas mi
sha snang bar gyur te/ ra reb kyi rtsa mor phyin nas/ da de na gna'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de 'dra ba kho nar thos so// rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi
khams mi mjed 'di nub phyog kyi rab las 'das shing/ gling bzhi pa las kyang 'das/ khor yug las kyang 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi bar gyi khor yug gi khrom la 'dug
na'ang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung lhag chad med cing mnyam par de 'dra ba kho nar thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma mo'u 'gal
gyi bu 'di pa'i sgra skad dbog par 'dod kyis/ sa' la rdzu 'phrulagyis bskang ngo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstangs pa dang/ de sangs rgyas kyi
mthu dang/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i khyim snyad 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi
khams 'od zer rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba don/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te/ chos kyang ston pa der gnas brtan mo'u/
00 'gal gyi bu chen pos phyin te/ dan 'dug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra skad de 'dra ba kho nar thos te/ 'di lta ste/ dbar na 'dom gang tsam gyi phyogasan 'jug pa'i mis mi cig
shos kyi sgra thos ba de bzhin du/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas kyang [” ]bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung sgra thos so// bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku'i khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus kyi khrunan dbag tshad phyad do// de nas byang chub sems
dba' de dag ga sbrad par bya ba'i lhung bzed kyiston m gdu bu de la gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'chag chung 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu dga' nas/
bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das dge spyong gi kha dog 'dra ba'i srog chags lhung bzed kyi rten ma'i gdu bu la 'chag tung mchis pa 'dag las mchis pa zhig/
bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ gas kyi bu dag khyod 'di lo bar s pa'i sims ma skyed cig/ de nyi'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po zhes bya sta//
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog ge/ nyan thos chen po rnams kun ng na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal
ngos mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag khyad du gsod kyis/ khyod
kyis 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul ston cig/ de
nas gnas partan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ran po che'i gling 'di skyil mo krung ga nug gis khyab par bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shag/
de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bus stong gi nam mkha' la shang ta la bdun tsam gyi gong du mngon par 'phags te/ rin po cha'i glang da skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par byas so//

skyil mo krung de las kyang mu tig gi rgyan 'phrang bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par 'byung ngo// mu tig gi rgyan 'phrang gi 'bru thams cad las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ngo// 'od zer de dag thams
cad kyi rtse mo dag las kyang barma rnams byung ngo/ khad+ma thams cad kyi snying po rnams la'ang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bzhugs par snang ngo//
ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang/ bcom ldan 'das pahAkya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te/
bsngags pa gsung ngo// de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o// de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar stong dang stong gnyis pa khub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi steng chen de'i 'jig rtan
gyi khams la da skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shesan gyis shig/ de nas//
gnas brtanamo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul da bsdus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtsha sa
gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di zhig bag slad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis/ bcol
ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dbyangs kyidakyil 'khor shes bar 'dod nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'osaso/
de nas bcom ldan 'das des/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
dbyangs tshad med pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i phun gyis/ khyod kyis lan gnyis su de lta bu'i so mas ma skyid cig/ gal te mo'u 'gal gyi bu
khyod shugs 'di nyid dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di nyid kyis nub phyogs logs su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par song yang/ khyod kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i
gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar gsung dbyangs tshad mad pa dang ldan no// de nas gnas brtan mo'u
'gal gyi bu chen pos// bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te// nyes pa bshags pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba gsung dbyangs tshad ma
ts+tsams pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal bas/ bdag ni nongs pa can te/ nongs pa 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ji srid cig nas mchis/ bcom
ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyad 'das pa nas khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so// mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol
pa bcom ldan 'das dag ni rang mo zhig nas mnyis pas lus dub sta/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod der mchi ba'i rngo mi thog go/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/
mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'ad ji snyam du sems/ khyod rang gi 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sbyin snyam du sams na/ khyod kyis de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir de ni
khyod na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phun gyis/ khyodabcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag tshol cig dang/ de 'di kyis khyod slar 'a pung
par 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu gal te khyod rang ga rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gronan bskal pa sudi kyis kyang 'du bar mi nus te/ 'jig rten gyi khams/
der ma phyin par bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sams/ shar ram/ lho'am/ nub bam/ dung ma/ phyogs gang zhig tu/
phyin gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag phyogs bslad de gang nas 'dir mchis pa ma 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis rnam
grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rag par bya ste/ gal te khyed rang ga rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na bskal pas kyang phyin bar mi nus so// kasol pa/ Atsos
ldan 'das phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhugs/ bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'galagyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
pa de ni shar phyogs gos na bzhugs so/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshon yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ shar phyogs logs su phyag 'tshal nas//
pa'i tshigs su bcad b 'di sbas so// mthu chen mnga' ba lha dang mis mchod pa// ye shes mtha' yas mtha' yas gsung ldan pa// rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam pa dgongs su
gsol/ slar yang zhing dera'ab tu mchi bar bgyi// na pa'i blo gros de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan ba 'a 'khor bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas
ba des/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol ba btab pa'i sgra de thos so// thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa 'di su zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'dan mo'u 'gal gyi bu sta/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das par song sta/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar
bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po ra sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas te/ de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'dodanas gsol ba 'debs pa'i sgra de lta bu phyung ngo// kun dga' bas
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'dir slar 'ongs pa dang/
de nyid du thos par 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khe'i das thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig
rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po blta
bar 'tshal la// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas// mdzod snga nas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer des
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+ma 'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed bo de lag las thal te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// de na thams cad
dang ldan pa 'khor des 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ gnas brtan
mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen bo yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan kyis tshe dang
lan bko'u 'gal gyi bu chen bo la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'galagyi bu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rjes su 'brangs te shod mug/ de nas gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcol
ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brtan to/ sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas/ des
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'a6late/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ spyan sngar yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/ phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa bshags pa//
bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal nas/ de srid du ring du mchis pas bdag nongs pa can te/
nongs pa 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das de srid du rang du mchis kyang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i gsung na 'di na natsem pa de tsam lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ji skad sAs pa de de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la ni tshad gang yang med de/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu gang de bzhin gshags pa'i gsung gi tshad dam/ mthA'
yongs su tshol bar sems pa dani nam mkha'i tshad dam/ mtha' yongs sutshol bar sams pa yin no// da ca' phur zhe na/ nam mkhas rjetsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs/
ba'i gsung gis khyab bo// gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ srogachags sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
do zhi ba'i blo gros 'da'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can thams cad kyi sams dang sems las byung ba'i
'jug ba gang dag yin pa de dag rtsa med ba yin nam/ zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag bo sems can gcig gi sams dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa
de dag kyang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa rnams kyis bskal par yang bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ brtse ba cha/
brtag par mi nus na/ soms can tham sa cad kyi lta smos kyang ca degos/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ zhi bar blo gros khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khyong du chud par bya'o// sams/
can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji srid nga ra 'ad sa/ sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa ches ston pa'i gsung gi ra
lag ga rnam pa'i ng de snyad du 'byung// de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong
gsum sems can gang yin pa// de dag rang rgyal 'dzin gyur bas// bskal par sems can gcig cig gis// soms kyi khams kyang mi shes so// sems can ga/nag yid ji
sAd pa// sangs rgyas kyis na rab mkhyen kyang// nga yis yid 'du shes so zhes// de na rtog par ma 'gyur ro// dus gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sems pa dag ni ja sud pa//
'jig rten mgon po chos ston tsho// dbyangs kyi yan lag de snyad do// chos kyi bdag po gsung ba na// dbyangs kyi yan lag dza snyad pa// chos kyi ming gas bshad pa yi// chos
bstan pa yang de tsam mo/[” ]/sems can kun gyi gzugs dngan// ming dang sams pa ji snyed pa// sems can snying po'i sa gcig nas// 'od zer byung ba de sdod do// 'jig rten
ts+tso dmagon po'i sa kun gyi// 'od zer dag ni ji snyad pa// sa ya dbang bo chos ston tshe// gsung ga yan lag de bas mang// dab bkod nas ni sangs rgyas kyis// bskal par rab tu
bstan mdzad kyang// sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyi// mtha' ma red par mi 'gyur ro// nyon mongs gzugs can ma yin rnams// gzugs can min pa'i tshig gas brjod/
ba gzugs can yin pa'i tshig gis ni// nyon mongs gzugs med zhi bar byed// ji ltar ga na gzugs med pa// thams cad du na ma dmigs te// de ltar nyon mongs gzugs med
ba na tu dmags par ma 'gyur ro// ji ltar tshag na yod min te// nang dang phyi phol mi gnas pa// de ltar nyon mongs rnam mod cung// nang dang phyi rol ma gnas so// ji ltar/
phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsung// gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba// de ltar nyon mongs ma dmigs kyang// de ni tshig gis brjod pa ni// sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig/ rab
'bring tha ma gang yin pa// de dag lus dang sems mi gnas// gnas pa med pa'i ng ma yin no// ji ltar sil snyan 'khrul 'khor byas// rlung gis bskyod nas sgra 'byung ba/ sgra 'byin
byed ba gang yang med// 'on kyang sgra rnams de dag 'byung// de ltar sngon chad rnam dag phyir// sems can kun gyi bsam pa skyod// sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung 'byung yong// 'di la de na
rtog mi mnga'// ji ltar brag rnams kyi sgra// dang dang phyi rol ma gnas pa// de ltar ma yi dbang po'i gsung// nang dang phyi rol mi gnas so// ji ltar rin chen ma rtog par// snang
bas sems can tshim par byed// de ltar rgyal ba'i mi rtog gsung// sgra kun rab tu rdzogs par byed// zhi kha'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba ni
@#// sems can thams cad kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par khong du chud par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i jag rten gyi khams 'din
skya pa'i gnas tha dad pa dag yod pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa rnams ming tha dad pa dag gas rnam par gzhag go/ zhi ba'i
blo gros 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ sa bla ba'i lha rnams
kyi 'di skad ces bya sta/ bra ba dang/ bla ba'i rtsa ba dang/ zab sel dang/ za ba 'gog ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal ba dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal
'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ bar snang ga lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya sta/ 'jug pa dang/ kun tu 'jug byed dang/ kun
tu 'jug khral dang/ kun tu 'jug sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ rgyal chen bzhi'i sakyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'byung ba dang/ dpog pa dang/ srog pa dang/ 'jig byed cig bya// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/
ba sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa nas 'bad par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'khor ba dang/ kun snyan dang/ zad pa dang/ zad pa ldog byed ces bya'o// 'di sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog
pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod pa dang/ gnod pa snyan dang/ gnod pozad par/
gnod pa zad par sgom pa zhes bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog bdang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/
dgaldan gyi lha rnamA kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ shin tu mi bsrun dang/ mi bsun rtsa ba dang/ ldog po dang/ yang dag par ldeg byed ces bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal/
kun 'byung pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'grela'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa da/ 'phrul dga' lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ rkyal pa dang/
kun turkyal khyod dang/ rgyalazad dang/ rgyalazad sgo zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya sta/ haha ho dang/ haha thob byed dang/ ha ha bral dang/ haha/
srol khyad ces bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/
bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya sta/ma mur dang/ mo mur gnod dang/ ma mur 'dor 'dod dang/ ma mur sgrol zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung
ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de// tshangs pa'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ sdug ba dang/ sdug
byed dang/ sdug banyal dang/ sdug bar 'khor zhes bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog
bar 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yan padi/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'dzag pa dang/ kun tu 'dzag byed dang/ rgyun gcod dang/ shin tu 'byung zhes
bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdugakhasal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs pa'i
bza mdunan 'don gyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ rmadang/ rma'i mtshams sbyor ba dang/ rma 'u ba dang/ rma nye bar zhi byed ces bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal
kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ rgyal byed
dang/ rnam par rkyal byed dang/ rgyal bamathar byed dang/ byed ba thob byed ces bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/
sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'od chung ga lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste/ ha ha dang/ [”]hahadang/ hu hudang/ ha ra nu saMn d+hi zhes bya'o// 'dir
sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ dge chung gi lha rnams kyis 'di skad
ces bya ste/ o ha ta dang/ na ba hi ta dang/ nag kI ta dang/ na ga ma ni zhes bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/
sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa do/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bu ste/ stan pa dang/ yang dag par ston pa dang/ zad pa stan pa dang/
kun tu stan pa zhes bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ dag
rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces byas/ yongs gcod dang/ yongs gcod 'byung dang/ khyim mtha' dang/ rtag tu rnam dag ces bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug
bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ mche ba'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ rjes su
'gro dang/ ma 'od ba ma yin dang/ rjes kyi mtshams dang/ rjes kyi mtshams zhes bya'o// 'da'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang
sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag pa dang/ dag ba can dang/ dag pa yongs su dag dang/
go bar 'gro zhes bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'alam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/
gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad tsos bya ste/ ma ma ma ma dang/ ma ma mo mo dang/ man nun la dang/ man nu gamazhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang/ sdug/
ba[j]bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ shin tu mthong galha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ste/
grol ba dang/ grol ba can dang/ grol ba'i rtsa ba dang/ grol ba bya brag phyed pa mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o// 'dir sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/
sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa la 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya sta/ mi bya ba dang/ mi spyod
pa dang/ byed bral dang/ byed pa mthar thug ces bya'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro
ba'i lam zhes bya ba sang lan pa de/ gnas gtsang ma'i ri kyi 'og man gyi lha rnams kyis 'di skadatsos bya sta/ mthar thug dang/ shin tu mthar thug dang/ ma rtog ba dang/ shing
mtshams sbyor bamad pa zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar nga ltar lha rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du klu rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// dri wa rnams kyi'ang gzhan na// lha
ma yin rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// nam mkha' lding rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// ma 'am rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// lto 'phya chen po rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// gnod spyin lag na
gzhong thogasa rnams kyi'ang gzhan no// 'phreng thogs rnams kyi bden pa rnam par gzhag pa'i ng gzhan no// zhi ba'i blo gros gang yul chen po
bcu drug tu bsdu bas bsdus ba'i yul stong gsa' dzam bu'i gling 'di yongs su gang sta/ gangan ma rnams kyi tshig kyang gzhan/ nges ba'i ga kyang gzhan/ brda'ang tha dad pa de
lang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du mang tha dad ba rnams kyis bden pa dag rnam par bkod de/ 'di lta sta/ yul ka sha dang/ pa hu pa dang/ tho gar
yul dang/ ya ba na dang/ kam po dza dang/ kha sha dang/ na dang/ rgya yul dang/ da ra ta dang/ u ra sha dang/ pi lan dang/ so ma dang/ bram ze dang/
rgyal rabs dang/ rje'u rigegs dang/ dmangs gas dang/ dartsi ba dang/ ki ra ta dang pu lan ta dang/ pun tra dang/ ku run dang/ lngalen dang/ sha'
phyogs dang/ bu ru ra ba dang/ lho phyogs dang/ kaling ka dang/ gcer bu dang/ ba nas ka dang/ pa na ta dang/ sA la ta dang/ khyi gdong dang/ wa gdong dang/
kri pa sha'i gdong dang/ sa'u tshugs pa dang/ gnam gdong po dang/ phyi phyogs gdong dang/ byang mtshams gdong dang/ rjes su rgyug dang/ rgya mtsho'i khol pa dang/
sul mthas gtugs kha dang/ ang ku ra dang/ mar dang/ sna med dang/ glebakra dang/ phyogs kyi gcer bu dang/ gshog thogasagasar bu dang/ sgus te 'gro dang/
rdzogs byed rnam pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi bar na gnas pa'i yul la sogs pa yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros gangan ma rnams kyi tshig dang/ ngos
ba'i tshig dang/ brda tha dad ba der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du mang tha dad pa rnams kyis 'don pa dag bstan kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems kyi
rjes su 'brang ba ma yin zhing/ rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin ba 'byung ngo// zhi ba'i blo gros stong ga 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bden pa ming tha dad pas bstan pa bye ba khrag
khragi brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yod de/ bden pa bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ don dam ba'i bden pa dang/ skya ba med pa'i bden pa dang ji lta ba bzhin gyi
bden pa dang/ ma'i khrugs pa'i bdon bar donagatsamid tu yang dag par 'dus te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'i nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// bam kho lnga ba/
zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungan sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa/ sems can thams cad kyisom nyi sol ba'o//
zhi ba'i blo gros lags bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na sems can du bas bar bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa// sangs rgyas kyi ye
shes kyis mkhyen ba'i sags can gyi khamasanas mang ga/ sa'i khams na de ltar ma yin no zhes bya ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros yongs su brgyag panye bar bzung nas/ sems can de dag
thams cad snga phyi med bar mi lus thob bar gyur la/ zha ba'i blo gros sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par
gyur la/ shA ra'i bu lta bu sems can de dag thams cad kyi shes rab dang/ ye shes gang yin pa' ris rab dang/ ye shes de sems can gcig dang ldan par gyur rung/ rnam grung
'das sems can thams cad shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la/ zhi ba'i blo gros sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par the tshom gyi dri
ba sams shing gzhal te yongs su btsal la/ sems can gcig gi the tshom gyi dri ba gang yin pa de nyes pa'i ma yin zhing/ zhi ba' blo gros rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad kyis
the tshom gyi dri ba tha dad pa bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du dong nas sa gol gtogs pa srid la the tshom gyi dri ba de dag gsol kyang/ des sems can gcig gi rjes su zhugs
ba pa'i dran bas thams cad bzung nas/ gsung brjod ba gcig gis de dag gi the tshom gyi dri ba thams cad gcod de/ de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi thatshom gyi dri ba chad par shes
shang bcom ldan dag kyis zhus pa lung bstan ngos thams cad kyang sems rangs par 'gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi
dogs pa gcod cing/ sems can thams cad kyi som nyisal kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de la thugs kyis mdzad pa 'am/ gsung du brjod pa'i ng ma mnga' la/ mdzad pa
de'ang mdzad de/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o// 'di na gsung rmad du byung ba'o// 'di ni gsung yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin
bshigs pa'i gsung ngo mtshar can dang/ gsung ga gsang ba 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bshad pa'itsho/ srog chags sum khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thadan tshangs par spyad par spyod
ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ ma tog rnams kyis kyang gtor/ rin po che'i gdugs rnams kyang btang ngo//
de nas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la'ang 'og/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lus la'ang phog nang/ 'khor thams cad la'ang 'thor ro// rin
brtse gdugs de dag kyang bar snang la gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug ga steng na 'dug ga/ rin po che'i gdugs de dag las kyang/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom
ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyi ba dang/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rmad du byung ba 'di bstan pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ bskal pa
bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis btang ba lags so zhes sgra byung ngo// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la
phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed do/ tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gi gsang ba'i bdag bo lag na rdo rje mthong ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos pa ni bdag
cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas/ chos shang som nyi za bar ma 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni don yod pa'i mnyidi rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dag ni de
bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar 'gyur zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par yaba'agyur ro zhes smras so/// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis 'khor thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag
pa dbazhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang ma mthun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs
'di'i nang du bstan to// bsnyad do// yang dag par bshad do// gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ring por ma thogs par chos nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad thos nas mos pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ ma sngang/ mi skyag/ skag par mi 'gyur ba dang/ don rtogs pa'i rjes su rtogs pa dang/ de bzhin nyid du
sgrub ba de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ phyogs
su'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dang ga tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos to/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// ma tog gachig chen po'ang bab bo// sil snyan dang khel
mo'i sgra'ang byung ngo// sems can grangs med pa dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sams dpa'i grangs med pa dag gis ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni skye ba gcig gis thogs
par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byas so// de nas 'khoragyi khyams de'i dbus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyisan sngar chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam
gyis sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad ba brtol te mngon du byung bar snang ngo// de dag stong gi bar snang nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon por 'phags te/ stong
gsum gyi stong chen po' 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad spos chus chag chag btab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal/
ba zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis chu'argyun mngon par 'phags pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags te/ 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ zhi ba'i blo gros chu'i rgyun 'di dag sems med kyang/ nga ltar 'di dag gis sa chen po brtol te mngon par 'phags ba de bzhin du/ gang dgachos kyi rnam grangs
'di 'chang ba dang/ de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ de dag ni ma rig ba dang lta bar gyur pa'i sgo glegs bcag nas/ chos kyi
snang ba mi bzad pa dang/ shes rab dang spobs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des skyes bu de dag gis legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad kyi sams rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur
te 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du rag par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la de bzhin
gshegs pa 'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang/ thugs kyi 'phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhen/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris su sems can
gang dag skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gcig gas bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas kyang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe mthar ma thug gi bar du de dag gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par
shes pa gzhan gyi rjes su ma 'brang sta/ de nas shi 'phos nas las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzan to// zha ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
shes pa'i ng mi gnas ba sta/ gang ga nub mo byang chub sems dpa' blon mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang/ gang gnub mo
sa @#/// de bzhin gshegs pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i myang n las 'das pa'i dbyangs su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
ldog pa mi mnga'/ thugs rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs rnam par dpyod pa ma mnga'/ thugs 'gyur ba mi mnga'/ thugs kyi tshad mo ma'/ thugs 'khrul pa ma mnga'/ thug
sal ba ma ma'/ thugs g.yeng ba ma mnga'/ thugs khengs pa mi mnga'/ thugs dma' ba mi mnga'/ thugs kun tu srung ba ma mnga'/ thugs rgyu ba ma ma'o/ thugs shani
tu rangs pa ma mnga'/ thugs rnam par 'khrug pa mi mnga'/ thugs la khon du 'dzin pa mi mnga'/ thugs g.yo ba mi mnga'/ thugs nges par sems pa mi mnga'/ thugs dgyes
ba ma mnga'/ thugs la gnod pa mi mnga'/ thugs 'jug pa mi mnga'/ thugs rab tu rgyu ba ma mnga'/ thugs la rtog pa ma ma'/ thugs la rnam par rtog pa mimapa'//
thugs la yongs su rtog pa mi mnga'/ thugs la zhi gnas ma mnga'/ thugs la lhag mthong ma mnga'/ thugs rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma mnga'/ rang gi thugs la
gnas pa mi mnga'/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba mi mnga'/ thugs mig la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la gnas pa mi
[ps/]mnga'/ thugs gzugs la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg la gnas pa ma ma'/ thugs chos la gnas pa mi mnga'/ thugs dmigs
pa la gnas pa ma mnga'/ thugs yid la gnas pa ma mnga'/ thugs nang na gnas ba mi mnga'/ thugs phyi rol la gnas pa ma mnga'/ shugs de chos rnams la ma 'jug go/
thugs de la shes la ma 'jug go/ thugs de 'das ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba la ma rtog go/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa na de ltar thugs yongs su dag
pa sta/ thugs kyi chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la/ chos thams cad la'ang de'i ye shes ma chags ma thogs par 'jug go/ rang gathugs yongs su dag pas sems can gang gi/
sems kyang yongs su ma dag pa mgazigs te/ de gzigs kyang gzigs pa ma yin zhing rnam par mi rtog ge dgazigs kyang spros pa mi mdzad do// gzigs pas kun g.yogs
ba dang/ rnam par gzigs pa mi gzagegs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de na sha' mig gi mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ shes
rab kyi mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ chos kyi mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi snyan gyis gzags pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ lha'i rna ba'i thos pa dang ldan/
po ma yin/ gzhan gyi sems la lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa ma yin/
zag pa zad pa shes pa dang ldan pa'i ng ma yin/ de chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa'i ng ma yin te/ chos thams cad la chags pa med par ldan pa'i ng yan no// de'i de bzhin gshegs
ba'i ye shes kyi rgyan rnams ni sgram pa mi mnga' zhing spyan gyis grub la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar gnas so// sems can gyi srod ba thams cad la'ang gzigs so//
sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnamo par byang ba'ang rab tu mkhyen to// de'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jags pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mkhyen
ba'ang bsnyal ba mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag na lhun gyis grubatse sgrim ba mi ma' la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa ma mnga' bar 'jug go/ de bzhin gakashegs pa na/
sogs dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa dang yang bralal/ ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi 'dor ro// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad la/ de'i chos thams cad
la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i shes kyang gang du'ang ma chagasas// zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa gang yang sprul pa de
la na sams kyang ma mnga'/ yid kyang ma mnga'/ rnam par shes ba'ang ma mnga'/ ska'i 'du khyed kyang mi mnga'o/ gsung gi 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/ thugs kyi du khyed kyang mi
mnga' mod kyi/ 'dape ltaste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad do// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng sprul pa dang mtshungs pas
mnyam mo// sprul ba'i chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog go/ de la sku'i rtsom pa dang/ gsung gi rtsom pa dang/ shugs kyi rtsom pa'i ng mi snang la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams
cad kyang mdzad de/ de'ang lhan gyis gruba'ang sgram pa mi mnga' la/ mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad do// de'i phyir zhe na/ zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas
sprul pa'i rang bzhinagyi mtshan nyid du chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas kyang/ sems can la thugs brtse bas de bzhin du
bstan to// zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs ba'i yi shes na 'dus byas la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas la gnas pa ma yan/ phung po la gnas pa ma yin/ khams la
gnas ba ma yin/ skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi la gnas pa ma yin/ dge ba la gnas pa ma yani/ ma dge ba la gnas pa ma yin/
'jig rten pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas
ba ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin/ da lta
byung ba la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags pa la gnas pa ma yin/ so sor brtags pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ma yin to/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ya
shas gnas pas mnga' 'o// de chos gang yang mngon par ma sgrub la sems can la thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang/ spyod pa dang/ bsam pa rnams
la'ong de yi shes mthong ba chags pa mi mnga' zhing thogs pa ma ma po' ba 'jug ste/ de'ang lhun gyis grub nang sgrim pa mi mang la/ mngon par 'du bya ba mi mnga' bas 'jug go/
zhala'i blo gros 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba ste/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas kyang ma mdor la/ sems can thams cad la sams rnam par rig par yang mdzad
pas thugs bsam gyis ma khyab pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thugs kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya sta dgu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan
wa bshAr dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na da
ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams nad kyi slad na'ang gsang ba pa'i bdag po mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shAri'i
bu bya ba 'di bsam gyis mi khyab kyis zhig cig/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi/ shA ra'i bu gang dag dad
cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dga gnas 'di la skrag bar ma 'gyur ro// gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa/
la yid ches par mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rtag tu pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das da ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mthong lags te/ 'di bdag gas sngon nanam yang ma mthong ngo// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag
na rdo rje 'di ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyab rgyab na'ang gnas te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang/ mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad du'ang
lag na rdo rje'i gzugs su kun tu ston to// shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyad 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad
shu kyi rgyab rgyug tu gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ lag na rdo rje gzugs kun tu bstan kyang/ des ye shes kyin gyi rlabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i
bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdordzi 'dug pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis da gdod mthong lags te/ sngon ni ma mthong ngo//
bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu b gnas na/ khyod kyis de ma mthong ba ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig
rten skyong ba gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa de dag gis na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje rdo rje thogs shing rtag tu 'dug par mthong ngo/ shA ri'i bu
byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sprul kyang/ de dag thams cad kyi rgyab na'ang
gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas par snang// byin gyi rlabs de dag thams cad ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sngal pa gang yin pa de
dag gi sab na'ang 'di'i phyin gyi rlabs kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas te/ shA ri'i bu gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni de ltar ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i byin gyi
rlabs kyi stobs dang ldan no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya sta bcu pa'o////de nas byang chub sems dpa'
zhi ba'i blo gros kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces sbas so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sams dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying por
'gre ba dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ bkod pa bstan pa la brtsams te/ de na rmad du byung ba'i rgyu gang dag byung ba gang du khyod la mang+gen sum
gyur pa la khyod stobs par gyis shig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bkod pa byung ba ni tshad med de/ de dag ni rtsi'i tshad bskal
par gnas pas kyang rgyas par rnam par phye ste bstan par sla ba ma yin med kyi/ 'on kyang cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa'i bka' ba spyod pa
na rnam pa gcig ma yin te/ mustags can gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas spyad do// dka' thub dang lus la yongs su gdung ba ja sAd dang/ lus kyi spyod lam ji snyid
kyis pha rol mu stags can dag mngon par snyams pa de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa dang/ chos mchog tu gyur pa'i bya dka' ba dang brtul zhugs dang dka'
thub gang dag de dag gis bya bas kun tu bstan par ma nus pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas kun tu bstan te// zhi ba'i blo gros de la kha cig gis na byang chub sems dang 'a rkang pa ya
gcig btsugs te 'dug par mthong/ kha cig gis ni lag pa btog ste 'dug par mthong/ kha cag gis na nyi ma la lta zhing 'dug par mthong/ kha cig gis na gdung ba lngas gdung bar
mthong/ khacig gis na tsog tsog por 'dug runge song ba la sbyor bar brtson par mthong/ kha cig gis na rkang pa btsugs te mi 'gul bar mthong/ kha cig gis na rkang pa gyen du sgrung/
'jug bar mthong// kha cig gis ni kha bub tu 'dug par mthong/ kha cig gis ni tsher ma'i stang na nyal bar mthong/ kha nag gis na ba glang galci ba'i nang na nyal bar mthong/ kha cig
gas ni rdo leb la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par mthong/ kha tsage ba/sa na rtse gi pa la snyas pa dang/ kha cig gis ni shade leb la snyes pa dang/ kha cig gsan gtun shang la snyes pa
dang kha cig gis ni phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma yongs su bsgyur pa dang/ kha cig gis ni shang leb gyon pa dang/ kha cig gis na tsa mun dza'i gos gyon pa dang
ni/ kha cig gis na rtsa bal ba dza'i gos gyon pa dang/ kha cig gis na rtsa ku sha'i gos gyon pa dang/ kha cig gis ni sa'i dgas kyi pags pa gyon ba dang/ kha cig gis na lca tshur gyon pa
dang kha tsag gsan sbyin mor 'dug pa dang/ kha dag gis nirtsa dar b+ha'i gos gyon pa dang/ kha cig gis ni shing shun gyi gos gyon pa dang/ kha cig gis na sra da za ba dang//
kha cig gis ni nas za bar mthong ngo// kha cig gis ni rtsa ba dang lam za pa dang/ ma tog za ba dang/ 'bras bu za ba dang/ sdong bu za ba dang/ gzegs ma za ba dang/ pad+ma'i
rtsa ba za ba dang/ zhag drug sbyang ba dang/ sha ma za ba dang/ rgya shugs za ba dang/ nas shAn te ma za ba dang/ na ni za ba dang/ mon sran sda'u za ba dang/ mon sran gre'u
za ba dang/ bra yos za ba dang/ tal bra ba dang/ 'bras skam za ba dang/ chu 'thung ba tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang/ mar gyi thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang/ sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa tsam gyis
'tsho ba dang/ 'o ma'i thags pa tsam gyis 'tshob dang/ khatsag gis na zas ma za ba dang/ kha cig gis na gnyid dang bral bar mthong ngo// kha nag gis na 'dug pa 'ba' zhig tu mthong ngo/
kha sug gas na 'greng ba 'ga' zhig tu mthong ngo// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam de dag dang/ dka' ba spyod pa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang ston to/ lo drug tshang
bar spyod lam gcig kyang ma 'khrugs par thams cad rdzogs par bstan par gyur to// brtul zhugs shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dang/ brtson 'grus shin tu
sbyangs ba dang/ dka' thub/na tu brtan pos lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang dka' thub thams cad ston kyang/ sems can gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag gas brtul zhugs dang dka' thub
gzhan dang gzhan du ma mthong// gzhan du na ci 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi 'dra ba dag gas sems can dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub mthong ba ni
ma gtogs so// zhi ba'i blo gros de la byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa'i btang snyoms can yang yin la/ bya ba de dag kyad kun tu ston te/ dka' ba spyod pa
'dus lha dang mi bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi thog ba gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas so// zhi ba'i blo gros lha dang ma gang dag rgya chon po la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba bus ba de dag
gsan/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug cing mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ bde ba myong ba dang/ la drug len
nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las langs par mthong ngo// zhi ba'i blo gros de la lha dang ma chos can chos 'dod pa/ chos bstan pas yongs su smin par bya ba gang
bzhi pa de dag gis na/ byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan ma byed bar rgyun ma 'chad par chos ston par mthong ste/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen
po la sbyor ba ye shes chen po yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o// chos kyi tshub la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// bya dka' ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa
bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar ledrug tshang nas byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smos pas brtul zhugs dang dka' thub de dag las
langs te// klung ne rany+dza na'i 'gram du song nas 'jig rten dang mthun par khrus byas te/ lus gtsang mar byas nas krungan rany+dzan nas byung ste 'dug par gyur to/ de nas grong mi'i
bu mo legs skyes ma zhes bya ba des/ ba stong gi 'o ma bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i 'o thug khyer te byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der song ngo// gzhan lha dang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag drug cu'ang rang rang gi zas thogs te 'khod nas/ so so
nas tshig 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsolacig kye skyes bu dam pa bdag gi bshos gsol cig ces zer ro// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa'
grong ma'i bu mo legs skyes ma la sogs pa lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri kha bye ba phrag drug cu bo de dag thams cad kyi kha bas de dag blangs nas/
thams cad bros kyang phan tshun ma mthong ngo// lha'i bu re res kyang byang chub sems dpas bdag gi bshos gsol te/ byang chub sems dpas bdag gabashos gsol nas/ blan med
ba yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar shes so// de dag thamacad kyang byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur te/ zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni byang chub sams dpa' bras len par sbyor ba dka' ba spyod pa yang dag par 'phags zhes bya'o// khris len pas sems
can yongs su sman bar byed pa dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o// @#//de nas byang chub sams dpa' lus bkrus te/ lus stobs
rgyu dang ldan par gyur nas bras thos te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ngo// de song ba dang sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu sa bzangs zhes bya bas/ sa la spyod pa lha'i bu thams cad la
bos te smras ba/ sa 'dzin gang zhig ma gam mkhaskyod pa// srid pa bsal dang khong khro rab spangs pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni shing drung byon// sa gzha dag na legs par
ba brgyan par bya// legs so zhes ti sa la spyod rnams dga'// stong gsum thams cad yongs su phyag bdar byed// ma tog sal ma bkram zhing sos mchog bdugs// sngos chu
dag gis sa gzhi chag chag btag/ lag na gzhong thogs de bzhin 'breng ba thogs// gzhal med khang nas de bzhin bar snang ba// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas dga'//
da tsho ma tog sna tshogs char du phab// gling bzhi pa dag rnams na skyong ba bzhi// ji snyed pa dag thams cad 'khor bcus te// rnam par 'dren la mched pa bya ba'i phyir// gser gyi
dra bas stong gsum thams cad khakab/ stodagasum 'jig rten brgya byin rdzu 'phrul che// de dag byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang las
ba doltar stong gsum thams cad mdzes par brgyan// 'thab bral lha rnams thams cad rab dga' s// skyes bu mchogal yang dag mchod pa'i phyir// mi mjed 'jig//
khams kyi stong gsum kun// nam mkha' bskrun ya dra bas bkab// dga' ldan rab dang dga' ldan lha rnams kyang// de dag mu tig dra bas brgyan pa byas/ rgyan 'phrang de bzhin
zla gam rnams kyang thogs// mu tig sal ma'i char yang rab tu 'bebs// lha yi rgyal po rab tu 'phrul gyi bar// rab tu dga' nas 'dzam bu chu gser gyi// dril bu'i dra ba gsar gyi
'drar bcas dang// sgra snyan bcas pas stong gsum thams cad bkab// thams cad don la ma 'jigs mchod pa'i phyir// dbang sgyur dag gis lha yi rin bo/
rnam par dag cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pa// 'od gsal dra med dra ba gcig kyang sprul// klo dang dri za lto 'bya chen po dang// lha min mkha' lding ma 'amon kun gyis// rang
rang gnas dang bkod pa rnams kyis ni// 'dod khams legs par brgyan nas mdzes par byaso/// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas song gsum gyi dbang po tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur zhes
bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sAng po la ma ngonadu phyogs par mthong nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la stsas kha/ grogs po dag shes par gyis shig byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po mnabs pa// dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/ go chasra ba mnabs pa/ thugs yongs su ma skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad
las nges 'byung ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyir// byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam ba thams cad
shin tu rnam par dag pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi 'as kyi lam thams
cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi drang ma 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa// sems can thams cad
la rab tu thar ba'i lam ston pa// dadapon chen por gyur ba/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dzoms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/ chos kyi snyan
thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa// snyan pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs brnyed pa// chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ rdog chen po'i rgyal po
'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos ba/ pad+ma chen bo lta bu/ chos thams cad kyi gzugs ma bsnyal ba/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba/
ma g.yo ba/ mi bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu shani tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs su dag pa/ shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin bo che chen po dang 'dra ba/
chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' da bdud kyi snga rab tu gdul ba dang/ bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu mngon par rdzo gsaM par byang chub par bzhed pa dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang/
mas @#// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang/ sang ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dad/ chos kyi sbyin pas soms can thams cad tsham par mdzad pa dang/ soms/
can thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig rnam par sbyang ba dang/ phas kyi rgol kha thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcad pa dang/ sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams la bstan bar bzhed pa dang/ chos thams cad la dbang phyug ga mnga' dbang b.res dpar mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po'i bzhud kyis/ de la grog bo dag khyed byang
chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang ma gro bya ba la spro bar gyis shage 6/ de nas stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs ba chen po mo mjed kyi bdag po de'i yade rab tu dga' nas/ tshangs ris
lha thams cad la sas pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa brgya stong mang po'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub bsags pa// skyes bu chen po dam pa de byang chub kyi sAng po ga la ba der bzhud kyi/
lhod la khyod kyis bkod pa chen po rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen bo thams cad brgyan bar gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa chen po ma mdzod kyi bdag pos de ba tshe tshigs su bcad pa/
'di dag sas so/ sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa// lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la phan bzhed pa// lha dang ma yas mchod pa lha yi lha// thub pa chen po byung
chub snying por gshegs// snga dang bcas pa'i bdu ni 'dul ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen gyi longs shes 'tshang rgya dang/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs bskang dang// dam
pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang// mkhas ba sang ga'i sgra chen bsgrags pa dang// sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang// dam pa'i chos mig yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir//
'dren ba byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams natsir bcad dang// sngon gyi dam bcas yongs su bskang ba dang// rdzogs sangs rgya sa kyi mdzad ba bstan pa'i
phyir 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs// legs par thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas na// sa gzhi dga' legs par brgyan par bya// stong gsum brgyan bar gyur la/
ltos shag kyi// 'dod pa'i khams kyang brgyan par gyur la ltos// 'dod pa'i khams na ji ltar brgyan pa bzhin// de ltar gzugs kyi khams kyang brgyan par bya// tshangs pa//
rnams nasoms dang legs so zhes// rab tu dga' nas stong gsum khargyan bar gyur// tshiltar 'dod pa'i khamasan bkod snang ba// de bas lhag pa'i mched pa de dag ston//
ma tog rnams kyis bkang zhing spos kyis bkang// rin chen rnams kyis mchod cing sil snyan bsgrags// tshangs pa la sogs 'og min lha ya rnams// rab tu dga' nas stong
gsum thams cad kyang// dga' bar gyur dang phyag khya'i 'os su byas// rang rang gnas kyi g.yang bkod pa byas// lha rnams kyis na gong nas keng/
du yang// lhag pa lhag pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu bstan// lha yi bu mo bye ba drug cu brgyas// byang chub rdo rdzogadan na rgyan par byed// spos chu yis ni kun tu chag chag 'debs//
ma tog sna tshogs dag kyang 'thor bar byed// sa gzhi dag la rin chen rnams kyang bal/ byang chub snying por rgyan rnams rab tu bstan/ thams cad bag gis brjod par mi nus pa/ de
sud tshad kyi bkod pa 'dir byas gyur// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na stong gi dbang po tshangs pa chen po ma mdzad kyi bdag pos/ tshangs
ris kyi lha thams cad la sbas pa/ grogs po dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang dka' thub rnams kyi spyod pa sbyad pa sems can gyi mchog skyes ba rar po 'di
byang chub kyi snying bor bzhud kyis/ de la khyod kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams thams cad bkod pa chen po rnams kyis brgyan par gyis shig/ de nas
ma mdzod kyi bdag pos/ tshangs ras kyi lha'i bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smAs so// sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa// phan bzhed 'jig rten ngon mdzad
bdag nyid che// den blo ngan sdur bcas bdud 'dul du// shing gi dbang po byang chub drung du bzhud// thams cad 'dus te lhan cig 'dong bar bya// stong gsum mi mjed 'di ni brgyanu
par bya// 'di na lhar bcas 'jig rten chos kyi dbang// yang dag mchod na bsod nams mtha' yas 'gyur// tshangs pa de dag tshig mchog de thos nas// stong gsum thams cad ma
lus brgyan byed cing// legs par phyogs te ma tog rgyal mtshan brgyan// 'jig rten khams na chen rang bzhin la// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od kyi bkod pa dang// bye ba gdugs
rnamAnamamakhar de dag sbrul// sA la'i shang rnams me tog mchog spras pa// dga' tshal lta bu de dag rnams kyis spel/ lam gang nas ni drang srong che gshegs pa// de ni shing
bdun bstams tshad du sprul// rin chen bzhi la gser gyi pad+ma bkram// kha khyer rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor// brgya byin gyis der bkod pa gang byas pa// de dag
mi rnams sngon ma mthong// sumacu gsum dbang rnam rgyal khang 'dra bar// de ltar gling bzhi dag na mdzes par brgyan// 'thab brulalha dang saka' ldan 'phrul dga' dang/
gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'og min lha ya rnams/ stobs dang shugs 'chang thams cad brtson par ni// byang chub snying po dam pa rgyun par byed/ byang chub snying por ga shigs pa'i
bar der ni// 'dod pa'i khams 'dir bkod mchog gang yod pa// lha 'am klu 'am ma 'am rtsi rnams kyi// de dag thams cad skad cig de la bstan//
phyogs bzhi dag nas lha mo bye ba lhags// ma tog rnams dang sngos dang byug pa yis// byang chub shing ni mngon du rgyan par byed// sngos chu yis ni kun tu tshag chag 'debs// byang
chub shing legs par brgyan byas to/ sumacu rtsa gsum lha ya u0f7a longs 'du 'dra// lha rnams bya ba dag gis mdzes sprul pa// bkod pa de dag tshag gis brjod mi nus/
zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ rkang ba'i mthil 'khor la rtsa bas stong pa gnyis las 'di 'dra ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des sems can/
dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skya gnas pa dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams rgyun gcod do// klu'i rgyal bo nag po'i gnas kyang snang ba/
rgyu chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas klu'i bdag po nag pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'od mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid
bad ba skyas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i rang gi 'kher la chags su bcad pas sas pa/ gsar gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i 'od// gnas 'dir lhang nger gyur pas na// kho bo'i lus ni rab tu
tshim// sems kyang rab tu dga' bar gyur// kho bos sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi// ltas bzang mthong ba ltar na ni// gdon mi za bar dpa' chen po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar
'gyur legs par phyi ma 'phrang ba dang// spos dang me tog skyug pa dang// gsar dang nor bu mu tig dang// dung dang rgyan 'phrang mchog rnams dang// rol mo sa la snyan rnams thogs la//
gdugs dang rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// ba dan dag kyang bsgong byas te// ston pa la ni mchod pa bya// ku ya rgyal po'i gnas 'dan// bzang po'i rgyan rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rab tu
dga' ba yis// sangs rgyas la ni rim gro bya// de nas klu'i rgyal po nag po chu ma 'khor dang banus/ gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas te/ ma tog dang/ sos dang/ 'phrang
ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan thogs pa dang/ sil snyan dang/ log rdob pa dang/ rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams/
dang lcan tsa'i gcig tu rang ga gnas nas byung ste/ spos chus gang ba'i sprin mngon par sprul nas/ sngos chu'i char pa bab bas/ klu mu tig dang klu'i ma tog gangar na 'babs shing/
klu'i mthu chen bo dang/ klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas byang chub sams dpa' la mchod pa byas te/ rkang pa la
phyag 'tshal nas/ rol mo dang sil snyan len pa dang bcas bas byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mngon par bstod do//
da la 'di skad ces bya sta/ skyes bu mchog gas 'od ni rab bkye bas/ sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad snang bar gyur// skad cig de la ngan song gsum yang zha// nag po'i gnas
kyang 'od kyis khyab bar gyur// klu yi rgyal po de yis 'od mthong nas// rab tu dga' sa de tsho tshig smras ba// gson gyi mchog ga 'od 'ad byung bas na// de ring sangs rgyas 'byung du
gdon mi za// klu mo do khrag khrig dag gis mdun bdar te// gdugs dang ma tog gis mchog thogs nas su// byang chub sems dpa' de ni ga lar song// phyag byas mchod pa byos/

nas gus bcas 'dug/ sa kun rin chen rnams kyis gang zhing de tshomadzes par brgyan// shing mchog kun dang sman dang rtswa rnam de dag byang chungashing la 'dud// 'din yod pachu klung tham cad mi 'bab mkha' la rlung

mi ldang// de ring bdud btul nasa'i jig rteshawamA cad bal gyis gnon bal gyur// srid pa gsum na brgya byin tshangs pa nyi ma zla khar 'od mi snang// mtshungs mad khyod kyi 'od kyis reg nas de ring ngan song
gsum bo zhi// bdag ga gnas su 'od byung nas ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston par bgyid// de ring rgyal bar byon par 'gyur gyis dgyes mdzod rangs shing tsham pa spyod//
bum pa gang ba 'di dag nam mkhar song ste khyod la skor ba dang// tsasha'i tshogs rnams 'di dag nam mkhar song ste khyod la skor ba dang// lhar bcas mir bcas 'jig rten dag
kyang mchod par brtson par gnas pa las// de 'ang 'gro ba'i sbyin gnas 'gyur zhing shes rab 'dod pa'i lam du 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis red pa legs snyad
gzi brjid che ldan pa// ma mchog 'khor ba 'jig dang de bzhin gsar thub ces na bya ba mchod// mi mchog 'od srungs dang na pishAkya thub 'tshog de ring bdag gas mchod//
bdagan sangs rgyas dba' mthong ma bral byang chub dam pa don duganyan/ ]sa na grum zhing rwa rnams ga yos la 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid// su zhig byung chub tu ni sems des
lhag pa'i bsam pas 'phags gyur pa// de ni de ring stobs bcu ldan par mi 'gyur gnas na ma mchis lags/ sang ge'i sgra bsgrags tshangs pa'i dbyangs can btsem ldan 'dren pa gsung
zhiba'i blo gros de nas kA'i rgyal po nag po'i nga ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba de/ klu'i bu mo rab tu mang pos bskor cung mngon du ba
la gas pas brtags rgyag pa la sa gsal kha chakyi nga thogs pa dang/ mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs thogs pa dang/ nor bu ri bo che sna tshogs thogs pa dang/ lha'i dang mi'i/
bas0/ 'brong ga brgyas ba thogs pa dang/ pog bor sna tshogs thogs pa dang/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs len pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rin po che'am tog
sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'ong ba la 'thor zhing gas su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'khrul ba ma mnga' ma sdang mi bsangs bag mi tsha// ma zhum mi
dman rab dgyes ma 'khru ba chags mi ma 'a// sdang dang rmongs dang brkam pa ma mnga' chags bral ba// rnam grol drang srong chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dogs bral thug ru bral
[' ]zhing dul la ma rig sel/ 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las rab tu 'grel// gnas dang skyabs dang glang ma mchis par mkhyen nas ni// gnas khyod skyabs khyod 'jig rten
gsum bo dag tu byung// dziltar lha yi tshogs rnams dad rung rab dga' sta// mkha' las ma tog chaN+Dachen rab tu 'bebs ba dang// ja ltar gas chen dag kyang 'dor bar bgyid las
blo na du drang srongatshon bo mgon po rgyal khar dengagyur snyam// dgyes skyid shange dbang drung gshegs ma bsnyangs bzhugs mdzod la// bdud sde bas par mdzad de nyon mongs drakha drol//
ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal dbang de dag sangs rgyas la// da ltar byang chub rab mchog zhi ba 'tshang rgyar mdzod// gang gi ched du khyod kyis bskal ba bye mang du// 'gro ba dag ni grol phyi'i
dka' ba rnams kyang spyad// khyod kyi dgongs ba de rdzogs shing dbang drung gshags te/ byang chub mchog la reg par mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags//
bam bo drug ba// zhi ba'i blo gus de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas nas byung nas// byang chub kyi sAng po ga la ba der song ste/ 'gro pa na las
gyi g.yas rol na rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba sna nang 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs pa mthong sta/ lha rnams kyis bskyal nas
rtswa 'dzam bshani tu gzhonakha/ nyams dga' ba/ yadi dga' bar byed pa/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/ dga' ba 'khyil ba/ g.yas su 'khyil ba/ kha dog dang/
pa dri dang ldan pa/ ka tsa lin na kaltar regan bad ba sar gang blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ rtswa sngar gang byang chub sems pa
la byin te bsam pa thag pa nas blun chad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod do// zhi ba'i blo gros khyed rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa/ las snga ma 'phyi bar dang
chub tu sems bskyed rung sna 'ang byin no snyam du sems na de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zho na/ de na rtsa'atshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yin te/ ji ltar kho bo bskal pa
bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por khri gshog pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ zhi ba'i blo gros kho bos mngon par shes te/ 'das
pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di snga rol bskal pa dgu bcu tshu gtugan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gakhrigs
zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung rab la dge slong stong tham pa tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ bcom ldan 'das des khyed cag bskal pa bzang po la bla na med pa yang dag par
rdo gas pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de dag lung bstan to// de'i tshe na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur tu dug pa
des// byang chub sems dpa' de dag lung bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ 'di skad du bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' de dag byang chub kyi sAng por 'gro ba na song gi 'a khri byi dor bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo/// zhi ba'i blo gros de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan
zhig yin pa sAm du khyod dogs shing the tshom ba 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa 'di de'i de'i dus nas
bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// zhi ba'i blo gros khyod kyis rnam grangs 'di kyang cus 'tsho ba bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi son lam ji 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sems can rnams kyi//
ba ji lta ba dang/ dbang po yongs su smin pa ji lta ba ba na du/ da kha cig la na sna sngaT gang 'bul bar 'gyur/ kha cig lan rin po che bkod pa'i sang gi khri 'bul bar 'gyur re 3
zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po'i shing drung du song ba dang/ byang chub kyi snying bo'i lha rnams lha'i bu momi tog gi skon bu thogs pa dang/ spos/
dang phyu ma'i phur ma thogs pa khra dang lhan cig tu byang chub kyi sAng po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i ma tog
dang phyi ma dang/ spos dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byag pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// bdag nyid
chen bo mkhasnyangs dpa' zhing dul zhi ba// dgyes shang tshim pa brtan pa khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba nyams dgyes kha na ma tho ma mnga' ba// skyon las grol ba'i ston la bya sa/
'tshal lo// sdug bsngal chen por bying ba mgon med 'gro 'di la// khyod ni bde ba rab tu stsol ba'i mgon po gcig/ 'gro ba'i nyon mongs nad rnams
sngang ba'i phyir byung ba// sman pa'i rgyal chen grags ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar lha tshogs dad rung rab tu dga' ba yis// lha ya ma tog char pa rab tu 'bebs ba
las 'dod dgra sde dang bcas pa byams pas bcom nas ni// khyod kyis byang chub dam ba de rang bar s su nges// shing dbang drung du gshegs te khri der bzhugs nas su//
bdud btul nas na mun pa thams cad gzhom par mdzod// ji ltar sngon gyi thub dbang de dag sangs rgyas ba// de ltar byang chub kA ba mchog rab 'tshang rgyar mdzod// ji ltar
khyod kyis 'gro ba dgrol ba'i don dun// bskal pa bya bar dka' mdzad rnam par dag gyur ba// drang srong chen po khyod kyi dgongs mchog dang rdzogs kyis// shing dbang drud
du bzhugs te byang chub 'tshong rgyur mdzod// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dbas rtswa sngar gang khyer nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song sa na pa
dang byang chub kyi shing drung du bdag nyid kyis rtsa gding ba btang nas/ byang chub kyi shing la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas so// zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems
wa dpas rtsa gdang ba bting ma thag tu/ de nas lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong gis seng ge 'i khri sna tshogs pa blta na sdug pa/ mthong ba/ yangs pa/ rin pe ro thams cad kyis/
spras pa// rin po che'i kha khyer can/ rin po chu'i dra bas g.yogs pa// na po che'i dril bu g.yar ka'i dra bas sprul pa/ mu tig gi rgyun 'phrang rab tu sdus pa//
ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba brgyad khri bzhi stong byang chub sems dpa'i ched du ba shams so// zhi ba'i blo gros de nas byang chub sems dpas sang gi khra brgyad khri bzhi stong
