'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du skyo bar 'gyur zhing/ de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang lhan cig tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur to/ de dag gsani/
bskal ba nyi shur bdud kyi las rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du skyes ba/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa la gnas ba/ stan la
'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' byams ba dang lhan cig tu byang chub mngon par rdo gas par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis ni bskal ba nyi shur bdud kyi las dang las kyi
sgrib pa rnam par sbyangs so// de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ba'ang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gces spras byed pa yin na/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ ston pa lta smos
kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes rab 'jom dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas
ba'i 'jig rten la'angs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs bal mngon par bstod do// 'bag pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya ba las/ 'ag
ba rmi lam bstan pa le'u zhes bya ba 'dus ba bzhi pa rdzogs so// ka dgu brgya/ bam po gsum ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+wa bar ma dang/ zhu chen gyi
latsal ban de ba shes sde la sogs bas bsgyuranang zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slar yang skad gsar bcad kyis bsanas gtan la phab bgo
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mi tA ba byu ha/ nam mahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'od dbag med kyi bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/// bam
po dang po// sangs rgyas dngo nga chub sams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab
na bya rgod kyi phung po la dge slong sum khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dga' n chen bo dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad kha/ nyon
mongs ba ma da ba/ gnas pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas soms shin tu rnam par grol ba/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bdag gi don rjes su
thob pa/ rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan ba/ dul ba dang zhi ba'i mchog thob kha/ sams shin tu rnam par grol kha/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes ba/ rlung
glang chen bo/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur la/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ stobs thob ba/ man par shes pas man
bar shes la/ gnas brtan nyan thos chen po sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u decu dang/ tshe dang ldan ba rta thul dang/ tshodang ldan ba rlungs ba dang/ tshodang
ldan pa mang chen dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal bzang dang/ tshe dang ldan pa grags lha dad/ tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa lag bzangs dang/
tshe dang ldan ba byams ma'i bu gang po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ba glang bdag dang/ tshodang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan ba chu klung 'od srus dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ga ya
'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen bo dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal bu chen bo dang/ tshe dang
ldan pa gsus po che dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka pa na chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan ba ma 'gags pa dang/ tshe dang ldan ba grum bo dang/ tshe dang ldan pa
dga' yod dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kim pa la dang/ tshe dang ldan ba rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang/ tshodang ldan pa song ldeng nags pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa ba ku la dang/
tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa pha rol son dang/ tshe dang ldan pa lam bstan dang/ tshodang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang/
tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan thani dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang/ de dag dang gzhan yang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gnas brtan nyan thos chen po sha stag ste/ gang
gcig ma gtogs pa na/ 'di lta ste/ slob pa'i lamal gang du bya ba yod pa tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
mang po dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug
ta bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'du la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni shin tu dang/ zhal gyi
mdog na yongs su dag/ bags pa'i mdog na yongs su byang zhing ser por gda' ste/ 'di lta ste/ dpar na ston gyi gos ser skya yongs su dag pa/ yongs su sbyangs pa/ so
bor gda' ba de bzhan du bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang bo rnams ni shin tu dang/ zhal gyi mdog ni yongs su dag/ pags pa'i mdog ni yongs su byang zhing sar bar gda' sto/ btsun pa
pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta/ dpar bgyi na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar brgya tshad ba mgar ba'am/ mgar ba'i slob ma mkhas pas zhi ga'i nang du stsal te shin tu sbyangs nas/ la ba
sar po'i nang du stsal na shin tu yongs su dgatsang/ yongs su byang la ser por gda' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang po rnams ni shin tudang/ zhal gyi mdog ni
bak+kha/ u@#// yongs su dag/ pags pa'i mdog ni yongs su byang zhing sar bor ga'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gas snga bas kyang ches snga ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'a dbang/
bo rnams 'di ltar dang ba dang/ zhal gyi mdog 'di ltar yongs su dag pa dang/ pags pa'i mdog longs su byang zhing ser bor gda' bar ma 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag
'di snyam du bgyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rang 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rjes su
dgongs shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ring sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas bzhugs te/ rgyal ba'i gnas pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gnas pa dang/ glang bo che'i gnas pas
bzhugs pa snyam bgyid do// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo legs so legs so//
ci dona'adi khyod la lha rnams kyis bsad dam/ 'on te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sam/ 'on te bdag rang gi dpyod pa'i shes pas de ltar shes/ de skad ces bka' stsal
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don 'di ni lha rnams kyis bdag la bsnyad pa'i ng ma mchis/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rang ga dpyod pa'i 'tshal bas/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa na de rang 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/
da ltar byang ba'i dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams rjes su dgongs shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ring sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas bzhugs te/
rgyal ba'i gnas pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gnas pa dang/ glang po che chen po'i gnas pas bzhugs so snyam bgyid do// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyi rtog pa rgya che// dpyod pa bzang zhing spobs pa dge sta/ kun dga' bo khyod skya bo mang po
la phan pa dang/ skya bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ skya bo'i tshogs phal po che dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/
bde ba'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis yo shes mthong ba sdud kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa yashes mthong ba la gnod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo rdo
bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med pa'i phyir te/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed na bsod snyoms gcig gis bskal ba 'am/ bskal
ba brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngan/ bskal pa brgya stong ngag/ de bas kyang lhag par bzhugs kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bo rnams lanyams pa med do// zhal gyi
(mdog gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// bags pa'i mdog la gnod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba'i pha rol tu byon
pa'o// kun dga' ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba shin tu dka' sa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na u dum wa ra'i ma tog 'jig rten du 'byung bar dka'
ba de bzhin du/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgo bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas samasacan thams cad kyi don bzhed pa/ phan pa bzhes pa/ thugs
brtse ba can/ thugs rje chen po la bzhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu dka' 'o// kun dga' ba gang khyod 'jig rten thams cad kyi slob dpon khong dpa' ba dag 'jig rten
du 'byung bar bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs ba la don 'ad 'dra bar sems pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu
[z/ ]lan no// kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te// bsem
ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'di nas bskal pa grangs med pa de'i yang
chos grangs med ba ni tu rgyas ba tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab bar gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me
mdzad ces bya ba 'jib rten du byung ngo/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mar mo mdzad kyi snga la gyi yang ches snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ldan zhes bya ba byung ngo// de'i snga rol gyi
yang ches snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo// de'i snga la gyi yang ches snga lo'i du de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi drazhis khu ba byung ngo// kun dga' bo de bzhin
gshegs ba tsan dan gyi dri de'i snga rol gyi yang ches snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba byung ngo// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs ba zla ba'i zhal zhes bya ba byung ngo// de
bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med ba'i zhal zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gos pa zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dri ma med ces spu kha dang/ de bzhin gshegs/
ba klu zil gyis gnon zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i zhal zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri'i rgyal bo'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/ de ba zhin
u0f09 gshegs bar ba dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab brtsegs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gso 'od ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i 'od
ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba tse tumar snang ba zhes ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs bzla ba zil gyis gnon zhes bya ba dang/
da bzhan gshegs pa nyi ma'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sa la ma'i 'od kyis brgyan zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbal brtsegs zhes bya ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol ba'i mngon par mkhyen pazhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mchog ces bya ba dang de bzhin gshegs kha sos kyi rgyal bo
chen po'i snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha ba dang/ dri ma dang/ khong khro ba dang bral bzhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs zhes bya ba dang/ de
bzhin gshegs pa rin po che gtong ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan chen bo mnga' ba'i blo bar s pa'i mngon par mkhyen ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyis ]
nyi zla zil du rlag bar mdzad ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUrma sbyangs par snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems kyi rgyud kyi blo shin tu rgyas pa mngon par 'phags
ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'phrang ba'i rgyal bo ma tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba
dang de bzhin gshegs pa chu zla lta bu zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma rig pa'i mun ba rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po zhes bya
ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mu tig byu ru 'dra ba'i gdugs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed pa zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgrags/
ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin ga shegs ba song ge dang rgya mtsho dang brtsegs pa ltar bsgrigs pa'i rgyal bo zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho ri rab zla ba zhes bya ba
dang de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro la mngon par dgyes ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba ma tog 'byung zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sde b.res
zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba lcan bo brtsegs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gsheg
ga ba dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo'i rgyal po'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od ces bya ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi char rag to 'thor ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mas srang mdzes bar mdzad
ces bya ba dang/ da bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi du zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya spos dri zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po tshor snang ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin
gshegs ba mu khyud ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen bo zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha ba dang zhe sdang dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs

ba tshangs ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs pa zhes bya pa dang de bzhin gshegru ba yon tan chen po 'bar ba zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gsheg ba ta ma la'atsho btsan gyi

rdzagacan zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gsheg pa lo tog la ngon par mkhyen ces bya ba dang/ dbazhin gsheg pa tshashis pa rnam par 'jomazhes bya ba dang de bzhin gsheg pa ral pa can zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mu tig gi gdugasazhes thu'adang ba'i

gshegapa gsol gyi snying bo zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshog pa'il+la'isnying po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tog chen po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi togaces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa shi chen
dbal zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang bo zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba 'jig rten dbang po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje can zhes bya/
ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mdzes zhes bya ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i tog ces bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge 'i blo gros zhes bya ba byung ste// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge 'i blo gros kyi snga rol
gyi yang ches snga rol du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/
skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// kun dga' bo
de bzhin gshegs pa dgro bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal bo de'i bstan pa la/ dgo slong chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba shas cher dran pa dang ldan pa//
blo gros dang ldan pa/ rtogs ba dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ rgya chen po la chos pa zhig byung ngo/// kun dga' bo de nas dge slong
chos kyi 'byung gnas de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ de'atsho tshigs su bcad ba 'di dag gis mngon sum du bsod
do/ 'od ni dbag mad blon mtho' yas mtshungs// gzhan gyi 'odon gang yang ma gsal te// nyazla nor bu tshogs kyi 'od rnams ni// 'jig rten kun lham me lhan ma lags/ sems
can snying po gzugs na mtha' las te// de bzhin sangs rgyas gsung na mtha' yas dbyangs// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab brtson 'grus kyang// khyod 'dra 'jig rtan 'di na gzhan
ba ma mchis// zab cing shin tu rgyas pa'i chos brnyes pa// sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ni rgya mtsho bzhin// desakyang ston la khengs pa mi mnga' ste// tha ba zhe sdang sangasanas kha mthar
sgrol[;]ji ltar sangs rgyas mchog gi gza mtha' yas// ma dbang gzi brjidi phyogs kun lham ma mda'/ de ltar bdag kyang sangs rgyus chos rgyal gyur// skye dgu rgadang 'chi las rab
thar bgyi// sbyin dang dul dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan ting 'dzin de bzhin glog mchog/ brtul zhugs 'di dag bdag gis yang dag blang/ sems can kun
skyob sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// byang chub 'a mchog mtshungs med tshol bgyid cing// sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong du ma'i phrag/ gang+ga'i bye ma lta bur mtha' yas pa// mgon po de kun/
bdag gi mchod par bgyi// gang+gA'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten khams// de bas gang du mtha' yas zhing ga rnams// de dag kun tu 'od ni rab 'byin pa/ 'di 'dra'i brtson
'grus stobs ni brtsam par bgyi// bdag gis zhing yangs gtso bo dam pa mchog/ 'dus byas 'dir na btsan ba bgyis nas su// mtshungs pa ma mchis mya ngan 'das dbyings te//
de yang ma mchis pas na rnam par sbyang// phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa'i sems can rnams// der lcags myur du bde la dga' bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas tshad ma 'di na bdag gi
dpang ma log brtson 'grus stobs ni bskyod par 'tshal// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mi chags mkhyen pacan// mkhas pa de dag rtag tu bdag sems mkhyen/ bdagan mtshan chod
mchis te rtag gnas bgyi// smon lam stobs las ldog bar yong ma khagyi// kun dga' bo da nas dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal bo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon sum du mngon par bstod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par/
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal te/ yang dang yang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing yos su
sngo ba bgyidan/ ci nas kyang bdag skyar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya pa dang/ 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs par bstan du gsol/ rnam pa gang dag gas bdag ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa
yongs su 'dzan par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la yongs su rjod du gsol/ kun dga' bo de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegapa/
'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal bo des/ dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir dge slong khyod bdag nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa
bun sum tshogs ga yongs su zung zhig/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spro ba ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
! bkod pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang thos nas/ bdag ga rgyan bkod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ kun dga' bo do nas de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang khyag rgyal po des/ dge slong de'i bsam ba mkhyen nas don bzhed pa/ phan pa bzhed pa/
thugs brtse ba can gyis thugs brtse ba dbar bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul mi gcad pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po bskyod nas la byi ba thamakha/ sangs
rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi ci las
gyur pa dang bcas par yang dag par rab tu bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/
bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal bo de'i sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam zhig kha par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' la/
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu tham pa thub par gyur to// kun dga'
bo de nas dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig po de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs
@#// pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu yongs su bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po de'i zhang
la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gon nas song ngo// gong du'ang bskal ba lngar sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa
shin tu thag gu chab/ shin tu gya nom pa/ sngon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ma byung ba dag kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur to// smon lam shin tu rgya chen po yang yang
btab bo/ kun dga' bodo ltar dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig po de dag gzhong phun sum tshogs pa gang brjod pa de
bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa ches lhag par thag gru chab/ ches gya nom pa/ ches dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug
rgyal po ga la ba der song sta phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgabos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gas sangs rgyas kyi zhig
yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bzung lags so// kun dga' bo de skad ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po des/ dge
slong chos kyi 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng rjes su yi rang ba mdzad kyis/ dge slong gis sbos shig/ 'di ni dus yin gyis/
la bor dga' bar gyis shig/ mgu ba skyed cig/ seng ge 'i sgra sgrogs shig/ de thos na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas
kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa smon lam gyi gnas 'di lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de nas dge slong chos kyi
'byung gnas des/ de'i tsho bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// de'i slad du ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan bar 'gyur ba'i bdag gi smon lam gyi khyad par bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsan du gsol//
bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ yi dgas kyi yul dang/ lha ma yin gyi ris mchis bar gyur pa de
srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can
gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag de nas shi 'phos nas sems can 'ang ma dbang ba dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul lam/ lha ma
tha yan gyi ris su ltung bar gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi
sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha dog gcig par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lha dang mi tha dad pa dag gda' bar gyur pa/ gzhan du na kun rdzob kyi tho/

snyad tsam du ming dang brdas lha dang ma zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o//
bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gsangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad gal te tha na sems kyi skad cig thang cig la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag
khrage brgya stong 'da' ba'i rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya

pa bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sang rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad tha na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rjes su dran pa'i tshe rabs
dran par ma gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar rdzo gas par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag ga sangs rgyas kyi
zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad na'ajig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mthong ba'i lha'i mig thob par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa
de dag thams cad tha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du cig car chos nyan pa'i lha'i rna ba thob par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phying
chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der saMms can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad tha na sangs rgyas
kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa yongs su 'tshol bar pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba la mkhas par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems
can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag tha na rang gi lus la yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes 'ga' zhig skyed na'ang de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen
po'i bar du 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa nyid la nges bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o//
bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can 'ga' zhig gas nyan thos
rnams kyi tshad kyi grangs rnyed par gyur pa ltan/ tha na stong gsum gyi stong chen po ni 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur la/ bskal
pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bgrangs te grangs red par gyur na'ang de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba mi bgyi'o//
0 bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag klu na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag gi 'od tha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong g.yod cin dang ldan par gyur na'ang de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom
ldan 'das gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par sams/
can rnams kyatsho'i tshad la tshad ma mchis par gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan
'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho'i tshad tha na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bgrang bas mthar phyin par gyur na'ang de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams la mi dge ba'i ming
mchis par gyur na'ang de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang
chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis dbag ma mchis pa dag ming yongs su
rjod par ma gyur tam/ bsngags pa bsngags par ma rjod dam/ bstod pa ma rjod dam/ grags pa mi rjod pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod nas/ bdag gi mang shos te sems rab tu dad par gyur la/ bdag rjes su dran ba de dag gal te 'gum pa'i dus nye bar gnas pa'i tshe/ bdag
rgyu dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i mdun du 'di lta ste/ g.yong ba ma mchis ba'i soms kyis gnas par ma gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgya/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis
zad pag tu ma mchis pa dag na sems can gang dag gas bdag gi ming thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ soms gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang/
yongs su sngo bar brgyud na/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sgrib bas bsgribs ba'i sems can rnams ma gtogs par/ de dag tha na soms/
bskyod pa'i 'gyur ba bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o//
bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan
par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i
tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi don du go cha bgos pa/
'jig rten thams cad kyi don la brtson pa/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la mngon par brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dang 'i spyad
ba spyod par 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phu dud bgyi bar 'tshal ba/ sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'tshalo/
ba'ang gong ma'i spyod pa la mngon du phyogs pa// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas nges par byang ba rnams kyi smon lam gyi khyad par ma gtogs par/ de dag thams
cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skyo ba gcig gis thogs par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdage bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'its+tshA/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad snga dro gcig bzhin sangs rgyas
k+Shazhin dag tumachas la/ sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
phrag mang po dag la 'ad lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde bar sbyab thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdabag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di lta ste/ gsar
ram dngul lam/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai rlu 'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byaru 'am/ shel lam/ sdug gam/ rdo'i snying po ma/ mu tig dmar pa
la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'am/ rin po che thams cad dam/ ma tog dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byag bo dang/ bdug ba dang/ phyam dang/ gos dang/ gdugA
dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ mar ma thams cad dang/ glu dang/ gar dang/ la mo'i dbyangs sgra 'om/ rnam pa ji lta bu dag 'tshal ba nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
bskrun pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag sems bskyod ma thag tu gal te de dag la byung bar ma gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bor ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur ba de dag thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
pa'i chos kyi bka' mas mchi bar ma gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te
bdag byang chub thob pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' dag 'di snyam du bdag cag 'jig rtan gyi khams 'di na gnas bzhan du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med
dpag tu med ba dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'di lta ste/ na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang gzims chadang/ bsnyun gsos kyi sman dang/ yo byad rnams dang/ ma
tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sbos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rnams/
dang glu dang/ gar dang/ sil snyan dang/ na po che rnam pa thadad ba'i char rnams kyis bsti stang du bgyi ba dang/ bla mar bgyi ba dang/ rim gror bgyi ba dang/ mchod par bgyi
bar sams bskyod la/ de dag gas sams bskyed ma thag tugal te 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs brtsa ba nye bar bzung sta/ mchod pa 'di dag bzhes par ma gyur
pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das la gal te bdag byang chu ba thob pa'i gangs

kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad srid med kyi bu dang rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i lus dang mthu thob par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par m+mo gru
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyan gyi kha dog sems can 'ga' zhig pas
lha'i mig gis mtha' blta na'ang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gzi brjid ni 'di lta bu 'o// kha dog ni 'di ltabu'o// 'byor pa na 'di lta bu 'o zhes kha dog tha dad pa dag 'tshal bar ma gyur pa de
srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi

zhing de na thams cad kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dge ba'i bya ba chung ba des kyang khyad chub kyi shing dpag tshad stong drug brgya tsam du mthong par 'tshal bar ma gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na
(chod ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub
sems dpa' gang lung mnod pa dang kha ton bgyid par gyur pa de dag thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa thob bar ma gyur ba de srid du/ bdag blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes bar gyur ba de dag tham
cad shes rab dang spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob par ma gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tuman bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan
'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gang na kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhinge dbag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa mams/
tshad ma mchis pa dag kun tu gda' ba 'di lta ste/ dpar bgyi na shin tu byas pa'i ma 'ong ga dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil bor gda' pa de lta bu'i 'od gsal bar ma
gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing de na sa'i stang nas bzung sta/ bar snang ga bar las lha dang mi'i yul las shin tu 'das pa'i bdug pa rigs bzang bo de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la'o
bdag dra rab tu ba dar ba'i spos snod rin po che sna tshogs las bgyis pa brgya stong dag nas rtag tu bdugs par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ma tog rab tu bda' ba tha dad pa'i char rtag tu 'bab par ma gyur
pa dang/ rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i nga ro yid du mchi ba'i sngon rtag tu sgra 'byung bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gal te byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ bdag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis bsam gyis ma khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dag
tu sems can gang dag la gsal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad lha dang ma las shin tu'adas pa'i bde ba dang ldan par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam
gyis ma khyab mtshus ba ma mchis/ tshad ma mchas pa dag tu byang chub sems dpa' dag gis bdag gi ming thos te/ thos ma thag pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas tshe brjes nas/ byang chub
kyi snying po'i mtha'i bar du gzungs thob par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis khasam gyis ma khyab mtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshad ma mas pa dag na bud med gang dag gis bdag gi khang thos
nas rab tu dang ba skyes te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed bar gyur la/ bud med kyi lus la smod par gyur te/ de dag tshe brjes nas/ gal te bud med kyi lus lanags thob par ma gyur
ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i/ sangs rgyas
kyi yang dpag tum mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyabamtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa dag na sems can gang dag gis bdag ga
mang thos par gyur la/ ming thos pa tsam gyis byang chub kyi snying po'i mtha'i bar du tshangs bar spyod bar mi gyur ba de sridi du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogos par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/
bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs ba ma mchis/ tshad ma mas pa dag na sems can gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos la/ yan lag lnga'i phyag bgyi bas phyag 'tshal ba dang/ de dag
byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bste stang du bgyi bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bor ma brtsi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gos 'khru 'am/ skos+sa
sam 'drub bam 'tshod pa' las brgyad par gyur la/ chos gos rin po che gsar pa khre'u tshang rags bzang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba dag sems bskyed ma thag tu
bgos par bdag gso 'tshal bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ga la
to bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can dag skyes ma thag tu 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong dgra bcom pa yongs su gdung ba ma mchis pa bsam gtan gsum pa/
la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bur bde ba rnam pa de lta bu thob par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o//

bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar gyur pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa rnam pa ji lta bu
dga' dod par gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu dag rin po che'i shing sna tshogs las 'tshal bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du skyes pa dag gis bdag gi ming thos la dbang po ma tshang ba mang
pa thob par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mo bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob
ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dag gis bdag gi ming thos ma thog tu shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par
ma gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas skad cig gcig 'das pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam
gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa dag mthong la/ ting nge 'dzani de bar ma dor chab 'tshal bar ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par spro bags pa'i
byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'itshi/ sems can dag gis bdag gi ming thos la/ thos ma thag pa las byung ba'i dag
ba'i rtsa bas sems can rnams byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du/ gis bzang po'i rigs su skyo ba thob par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu sangor pa
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ 'di las gzhan du gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ga0
bdag gi ming thos par gyur la/ de thos ma thag ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dga' ba dang mchog dmag
dge ba'i rtsa ba dang phrad par ma gyur ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang
chub thob ba'i tshe/ 'di las gzhan du gyur pa'i 'jig rten kyi khams rnams su byang chub sems dba' dag gis bdag gi ming thos ma thag tu kun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzanithob
bar ma gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dag ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas skad cig gcig 'das pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/
bsam gyis ma khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa dag la bas sang bgyid la/ ting nge 'dzin de byang chub kyi snying po'i mtha'i bar du bar ma dor chab 'tshal bar ma gyur pa de srid du/
bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can

gang dag skyes bar gyur pa de dag chos bstan pa rnam pa ji lta bu nyan 'tshal par gyur ba chos bstan pa rnam pa de lta bu sems bskyed ma thag tu thos par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med ba yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tuphrug 9[']
gang dag gas bdag ming thos pa de dag bdag gi mang thos ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na
thod pa lang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu byang chub
sems dpa' gang dgagi bdag gi ming thos par gyur pa de dag bdag gi ming thos ma thag tu bgrod ba dang po dang/ gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa thob par ma gyur pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
las phyir mi ldog par ma gyur pa de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma bgyi'o// kun dga' bo de nas dge
slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des smon lam gyi khyad par rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag bstan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// gal te bdag gis byang chub thob tshe
smon lam mgo khyad par 'phags pa rnam pa 'di 'drar mgyur na// stobs bcu mnga' ba mtshungs pa ma mchis sbyin pa'i gnas// mi yi sang ge sems can snying por bdag ma gyur//
gal te bdag zhing rnam ba de 'drar ma gyur la// sems can dbul mang nor mang stsal bar ma gyur rung// sdug bsngal gyon pa'i mi dag bde bar ma bgyis pas// ma ya skyel po dkon mchog tu ni
[o/]bdagon gyur/ bodag ni byang chub snying bor de bar mchis pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams mang po thag gru che/ zhatha'adag tu gyur pa du ming grags ma gyur ba// 'jig rten mgon/
bo'i stobs brnyes bar na bdag mgyur// byang chub mtshungs med zhab yang dag tshol bani// dran dang blo gros rtogs pa rnam par nyams gyur cing// gal te bdag ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod/
spyod gyur na// 'jig rten ston ba stobs brnyes pa ni bdag ma gyur// shin tu rgyas 'od mtshungs ba ma mchis mtha' yas bas/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mgon bo'i sangs rgyas
zhing kun khyab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug thams cad rab zhi zhing// sems can dmyal par dong pa'i ma rnams zhi bar bgyi// shin tu mdzes shing yangs pa'i mig na phyi nas su//
mi rnams kun gyi mun nag rnam par bsal bar bgyi// dal ba med pa dag ni ma lus bsalanas su// gzi brjid mtha' yas mgo dragi lam du gzud par bgyi// sngon gyi spyod ba yod+ma
su dag pa zad nas ni/ mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od na lham me ma lags shing// nor bu'i tshogs dang ma dang lha yi 'od rnams kyang// mi yi seng ge 'i 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan//
skyes bu mchog gyur sdug bsngal rnams kyi gter gyur te// phyogs mtshams phyogs na de 'dra'i gzugs ni ma mchis shing// dge ba brgya stong dag na rab tu rdzogs gyur nas// 'khor nang
mchis te sangs rgyas seng ge 'i sgra sgrag go/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rang byung dag la gus bgyis te// brtul zhugs dka' thubakhye ba dbag med spyad nas ni// ye shes phung tshe
dam pa mchog rab sul nas su// smon lam stobs na rdzogs bgyis sems can snying bor 'gyur// ji ltar bcom ldan yo shes gzigs pa chags mi mnga'// ma yi dbang po 'dus byas
rnam gsum rab mkhyen pa// bdag kyang mtshungs ba ma mchis sbyin gnas mkhas pa dang// mi rnams nang na mi ya'adren pa mchog gyur cig/ ma dbang bdag gis byang chub rab tu thob nas ni//
gal te smon lam 'di 'dra 'di dag 'grub cen// stong gi 'jig rten khams 'ad ba tu g.yos gyur cing// lha yi tshogs kyis mkha' las me tog char phob cig// sa yang rab tu ga phos te ma
tog char yang bab// nam mkha' las kyang sil snyan rnams kyi sgra yang byung// lha ya tsan dan mdzes pa dag gi phyi ma yang// mngon par 'thor bar gyur te 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur//
bam po gnyis pa/[” ] kun dga' bo dgo slong chos kyi 'byung gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam phun sum tshogos ba rnam pa
de lta bu dang ldan te/ kun dga' bo smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa 'ad lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na nyung ngo// smon lam rnam ba 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ste/
nyung du zad kyi ye med pa ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal bo de'i spyan sngar lha dang bcas/
ba'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'askyo dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yon dang bcas pa'i mdun du smon lam
gyi khyad par rnam pa de lta bu de dag bstan nas/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub pa la gnas par gyur te/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba tsho ba nyid
dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thag gru chen po rnam pa de lta bu de dag ni sgrub/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad ba na spyod cing/ lo byi ba khrag khrig brgya stong dbag tu med/ grangs mod//
bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad mdo/ brjod du med par lan 'ga' yang 'dod pa dang/ gnod sems dang/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas
rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ lan 'ga' yang 'dod pa dang/ gnod sams dang/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes bskyed par ma gyur/ lan 'ga' yang gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri
dang ro dang/ reg bya'a'i du shes bskyed par ma gyur te/ gzhon nu de des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang/ dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can dang/ dgang sla ba dang/ gso sla ba dang//
par gnas pa thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas te mchod par byas so// sems can nad rab tu smin par byas pa dang/ tshong
bo na dang/ khyim bdag dang blon bo dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag la rab tu bkod pa de dag kyang tshig gis bstan bas mthar phyin par bla pa ma
yin no// de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang phyug nyi da dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang/ brgya byin nyid dang/ rab 'a thab bral nyid dang/ lo ngas sa/
dga' ldan nyid dang/ rab 'phrul dga' nyid dang/ dbang sgyur nyid dang/ u0f8blha'i rgyal bo nyid dang/ tshangs pa chen po 'di la rab tu bkod do// sangs rgyas partem ldan 'das
med ba de nyid la bsti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas te mchod nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya ba'i phyir/ gsol ba btab pa de dag kyang ngag ga las kyis sku sa
mthar phyin par bla pa ma yin no// de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis ma khyung 10 tshungs pa/
gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med par kha nas lha'i las shin tu 'das ba'i tsan dan gyi dro rab tu zhing pa'i bsung 'byung ba dang/ sbya'i khung bu thams cad nas me tog ut+pala'i bsung
'byung ba dang/ 'jig rten thams cad na gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus leg/
bar brgyan pa dang/ de'i rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang/ gos dang chos gos mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad dang/ me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug pa dang/ 'phreng ba
dang byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad dang/ rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang/ glu dbyangs mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad kyang
su'i khung bu thams cad dang/ lag pa gnyis nas 'byung ba dang/ zas dang/ sgom dang/ bza' ba dang/ bca'ab dang/ bldag po dang/ robro ba mngon por bsgrub pa thams
cado dang/ longs spyod dang yongs su phrad pa mngon par bsgrung pa thams cad kyang lag pa gnyis nas zag rung 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam ba de lta bu'i dge ba yang dag par bsgrubs so// kun dga'
bod ltar dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i sprad pa spyod pa na/ yo byad thams cad la dbang ba'i pha rol tu son par gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'byung gnas de bla
[s]@#/ 'dod pa chung ba dang/ chog shes pa dang/ rab tu dben kha dang/ zhe sdang med pa dang/ rmongs pa med pa dang/ drang ba dang/ ma dman ba dang/ g.yo
med pa dang/ sgyu med pa dang/ ngang tshul bzang ba dang/ mnyon pa dang/ snyan par smra ba dang/ rtag tu brtson pa dang/ dkar po'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa ma 'dor
bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi don du smon lam chen po yang dag par bsgrubs par gyur to// sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ slob dpon dang/ mkhan/
po dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus pa dang bcas shing byang chub sogs dpa'i spyod pa la rtag tu ga cha bgos te/ drang ba dang/ mnyen pa dang/ tshul 'chos pa med pa dang/ kha
gsag med pa dang/ yon tan dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa'i sngon du na 'gro// stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/
son pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba mad pa dang/ skyo ba med ba dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i gnas bas ni gnas pa ste/ nga rgyal med tsang ngag legs par bsrungs par gyur to//
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba spyod pa na/ des ngag ga las 'byung ba gang bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka la gnod bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu spangs nas/ ngag gi las gang bdag dang gzhan
gnyis ka la phan par 'gyur ba de la brtson par gyur te/ de ltar shes bzhin can du gyur rung/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang
'kher rnams su 'jug pa na/ nam yang gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos la rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba med par gyur to// de byang chub
sams dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ gzhan yang de nyid yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/ bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/
brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ gzhan yang de nyid yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/ gang dag dang ldan n gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang

der gtor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma sa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsgrub par gyur to// de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems

can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dbag tu med pa gang dag ngag gi las kyis mthar phyin par bla ba ma yin pa de snyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyad la na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang/ bstun gyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad rnams dang/ bde bar sbyar ba la rol/
[r/]@#// na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags sam/ 'on te mngon par rdzogs par
sangs ma rgyas sam/ 'on te da ltar byung ba na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ da ltan bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te chos kyang ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'das pa'i ng ma yin/ ma 'ongs ba'ang ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas da ltan bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stongan/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
can na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ces bya sta/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med ba dag dang/ nyan
thos mtha' yas pa dag gas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar to/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan no// de'i 'od ni debag tu med de/ de ni sangs rgyas
kyi zhing 'di sAd cig dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag 'di snyad cig dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag 'di snyad cig dang/ ses rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag 'ad snyad cig dang/ sangs

rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'di skad cig dang/ sa sa rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag 'disnyad cig dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag 'di sAd ga dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya
stong phrag 'di sud cig dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyad cig khyab par byas te 'dug go zhes mtha'i tshad rtogs par bla ba ma yin no/ kun dga' bo 'on kyang
mdor bstanan/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyis rtag tu khyab bo// de bzhin
du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ 'og dang/ stong dang/ phyogs mtshams kyi phyogs re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi phyi ma stod dag bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyis rtag tu khyab ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od 'dom gang pa dang/ 'dom do pa
dang / gsum pa dang/ bzhi ba dang/ lnga ba dang/ bcu ba dang/ nyi shu ba dang/ sum cu pa dang/ bzhi bcu pa dang/ lnga bcu pa dang/ 'od dbag tshad ba dang/ 'od dpag
tshad brgya ba dang/ 'od dpag tshad stong pa dang/ 'od dpag tshad brgya stong ba nas/ dbag tshad byab khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khyab par gyur te/
a @#// gnas ban ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo dpa gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyi tshad gzung ba'i dab bzhag pa mad de
kun dga' bo rnam grangs des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de 'od dpag med ces bu ste/ 'od dpag tu med pa dang/ snang ba dpag tu med pa dang/ 'od thug ba med pa dang/ 'od chags
pa med pa dang/ 'od thogs pa yod pa dang/ 'od rtag tu gtong ba dang/ lha'i nor bu'i 'od dang/ thogs ba med pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i 'od dang/ chags par 'gyur ba'i do/
dang dga' bar 'gyur ba'i 'od dang/ mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i 'od dang/ tshim par 'gyur ba'i 'od dang/ lta bar 'gyur ba'i 'od dang/ 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i 'od dang/
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od dang/ mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od dang/ mi'i dbang po dang lha'i dbang po zilegyis gnon pa'i 'od dang/ nyi ma dang zla ba zil gyis gnonacing mog mog por byed
ba'i 'od dang/ 'jig rten skyong pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ gnas gtsang ma ba dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha thams cad zil gyis gnon cing chog mog bor byed
ba'i 'od dang/ mdor bsdu na 'od thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i 'od de na dri ma med pa// shin tu rgyas pa/ lus la bde ba skyed pa/ sems dga' bar byed pa//
lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ drizo dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ lto 'phye chen bo dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams la spyi
dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang bde ba skyed ba/ sems can dge ba'i bsam ba can rnams la dge ba dang/ yang ba dang/ rtogs pa dang/ mkhas ba dang/ blo dang/
mchog tu dga' ba byed pa'o// kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhingagazhan mtha' yas mu med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su gang ste/ bskal par de bzhin
gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan gyi las rgyur byas pa dang 'od phun sum tshogs pa las brtsams te brjod kyang mtshan bstan pa dang/ 'od phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtha' mang
rtogs par mi nus la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i ng rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i
'od kyi yon tan 'byor pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang/ sobs pa bla na med pa dang/ de gnyis ka'ang grangs med dpag tu med cing/ bsam gyis ma khyab la mu
med pa'i phyir ro/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med de/ nyan thos bye ba phrag 'di snyad cig rtse 'am/ nyan thos
bye ba brgya phrag 'disAd rtsig re 'am/ nyan thos bye ba stong phrag 'di sAd ga re 'am/ nyan thos bye ba brgya stong phrag 'ad sod cigace 'am/ gtams phrag 'di
sod cig ca 'am/ dkrigs khrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ khrag khrig phrag 'di snyad cig nye 'am/ 'ther 'bum phrag 'di snyadag ce 'am/ mi 'khrugs pa phrag 'di snyad cig ste
ma rnam 'deg phrag 'a di sod cig ce 'cha/ rgyun 'bab phrag 'ad sAd cig nye 'am/ rgyal ba phrag 'di sAd cig nye 'am/ dbag tu med pa phrag 'di sAd cig tse 'am/ grangs
tshu mad pa phrag 'ad snyad cig rtse 'am bgrang du med pa phrog 'di snyad cig ce 'am/ mtshungs pa med pa phrag 'di snyad tsag tse 'am/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa phrag 'ad snyad rug ces de'i
tshad gzung bar sla ba ma yin no// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong mo'i 'gal gyi bu chen bo rdzu 'phrul dbang thob pa de 'dodon stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
na skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyin zhag gcig gis bgrang ba de lta bu'i rnam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pod bar 'gyur la/ de dag las gzhan
mi byed par lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi nyan thos dang bo 'dus ba bgrangs kyang de dag gis brgya'ichar yang bgrangs par mi 'gyur te/ stong dang/
brgya stong dang/ chadang/ dab dang/ rgyu'i bar du 'ang bgrang bar mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste// dper na rgya mtsho chen po zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la//
khyon dpag tu med pa la mi la la zhig skya tshal ba brgyar gshags pa'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs na/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang sku tshal pa brgyar gshags
pa'i rtse mos chu'i thags ba gcig blangs pa dang/ gang rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po phyin las pa de gnyis gang mang/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpag tshad stong yang rgya mtshotshon bo bas
nyung lags na/ sku tshal pa brgyar gshags pa'i rtse mos chab thogs pa gcig blangs ba lta smos kyang 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo chu thigs pa
gcig lta bur/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dbag med kyin thos dang por 'dus pa la/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu lta bu'i dge slong rnams kyis lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du
bgrangs te/ 'di skad cig go zhes grangs kyis chod pa lta bu yin no// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po bya na las pa lta bu ni grangs kyis ma chod bar blta ba yin na/ nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis
pa dang gsum ba rnams lta smos kyang n dgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni de ltar mtha' yas mu med de/ de ni dpag tu mad do zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba
yin no/ dkun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i tshe'i tshad kyang dbag tu med de/ bskal pa 'di snyad cig lam/
bskal ba brgya phrag 'ad snyad cig rtse'am/ bskal ba stong phrag 'di snyadatsag ce 'am/ bsal ba brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cigartse 'am/ bskal ba bye ba phrag 'di snyed cigatsu'am/ bskal
pa bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig nye 'am/ bskal ba bye ba stong phrag 'di sAd cigartse 'am/ bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig ces bya ba nas/ bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
brag 'di sAd cig go zhes bya ba'i bar du de'i tshad rtogs par sla ba ma yin no// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i sku tshe'i tshad de ltar dpag tu med de/
de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dbag med ces bya'o// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de/ blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ji ltar da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dan bskal pa'i grangs dang/ bskal ba bgrang ba'i bar brtags ba de lta bu'i bskal pa bcu lon no
kun dga' po bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba na 'byob/ mod ba/ bde ba/ legs pa/ nyams dga' ba/
lha dang mi mang pos gang ba'o// kun dga' go'ajig rten gyi khams de na sems can dmyal ba med do// dud 'gro'i skyo gnas med do/ (yi dgas kyi yul med do// lha ma yin gyi
ris med do// khom par skyo ba med do// 'jig rtenagyi khams bde ba can na sang ba'i rin po che gang yin pa de dag na'i ngag rten na mi skyod do/ kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bad
ba can de na gros sna tshogs dri rab tu zhim ba'i ngad ldang ba'o/ ma tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs 'byor pa'o// rin po che'i shing ljon pos legs par brgyan pa'o// de bzhinagag
bas sbal pa'i bya sna tshogs sgra yid du 'ong pa can gyi tshogs kyis bstan pa'o// kun dga' bo rin po cha'i shing ljon pa de dag ni kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog du ma/ kha dog kha stod
phrag du tsho bod pa'o// kun dga' bo don rin po che'i shing ljon pa gsar gyi kha dog lta bu dang/ gser gyi rang bzhin dag yod do/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dang/ dbul gyi rang bzhin
dag lod do// ci cha ma'i kha dog lta bu dang/ ba cha m+ma'i rang bzhin dag yod do// shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang/ shel gyi rang bzhin dag yod do/ phyug gi kha dog lta bu dang/ stug
ga rang bzhin dag yod do// mu tig dmar bo'i kha dog lta bu dang/ mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin dag yod do// rdo'i snying bo'i kha dog lta bu dang/ rdo'i snying bo'i rang bzhi dag
nga@#// yod do// kha cig na gsor dang/ dngul dang/ rin po che sna gnyis pa dag yod do// gser dang/ dngul dang/ bzla dang/ rin po che sna/
gsum pa dag kyang yod do// gser dang/ dngul dang/ baiDUrlu dang/ shel dang/ rin po che sna bzhi pa dag kyang yod do// gsar dang/ dngul dang/ bi T+Thachu dang/
shel dang/ srug dang/ rin po chas lnga pa dag kyang yod do// gsar dang/ dngul dang/ bo cha cha dang/ shel dang/ srag dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ rin po che
sna drug pa dag kyang yod do// gser dang/ dngul dang/ bai DUr+ya dang/ shel dang/ spug dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ ni bo che sna bdun pa dag
kyang yod do// kun dga' bo de na gsar gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyi lto ba dang/ sdong po dang/ [”]yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ ma tog rnams gsar gyi rang
(bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin no// dngul gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang/ sdong po dang/ yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ ma tog
rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams bai DUm+ma'i rang bzhin no// bai DUrma'i shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang/ sdong po dang/ yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab
ma dang/ ma tog rnams bi cha zla'i rang bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams shel gyi rang bzhin no// shel gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang/ sdong po dang/ yal ga dang/ la
ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog rnams shel gyi rang bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams sdug gi rang bzhin no// sdug gi shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang/ sdong bo dang/ khal
ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ ma tog rnams sdug gi rang bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin no// mu tig dmar bo shing ljon ba rnams kyi rtsa ba dang/
sdong bo dang/ yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ ma tog rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams rdo'i snying bo'i rang bzhin no// rdo'i sa ri bo'i
shing ljon pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang/ sdong bo dang/ yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin la/ 'bras bu rnams gser gyi rang
bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams gsar gyi rang bzhin la/ sdong bo rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams blo rgya'i rang bzhin/ lo ma rnam
shel gyi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams sdug gi rang bzhin/ ma tog rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams rdo'i snying bo'i rang bzhin no/ kun dga' bo shing
[z/ ]@#/ ljon pa kha cig na rtsa ba rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams bri cha rma'i rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams sngag gi
rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ me tog rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams gsar gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing len pa
kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams be cha glu'i rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams sdug gi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ 'dab
ma rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ ma tog rnams gsar gyi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cag ni rtsa ba rnams shel gyi
rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams sug ga rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams mu tig dmar po'i ring bzhani/ khom rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams gser gyi
rang bzhin/ ma tog rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams bi ma'i rang bzhin no// kun dga' shing ljon pa kha cig ni rtse ba rnams sdug gi rang bzhin la/ sdong po
rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ me tog rnams
ma'i rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams shel gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shang ljon pa kha cig ni rtsa ba rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin la sdong po rnams rdo'i snying/
kho'i rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams dngul gyi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams bo klurgya'i rang bzhin/ ma tog rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/
'bras bu rnams phyag gi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cagi na du ba rnams rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin la/ sdong po rnams gser gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams
dngul gyi rang bzhin/ lo ma rnams khi cha rma'i rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams shel gyi rang bzhin/ mo tog rnams spyag ga rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams mu tig dmar po'i rang
bzhin no/ kun dga' bo shing ljon pa kha cig na rtsa ba rnams ni rin po ches bdun gyi rang bzhin la/ sdong bo rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ yal ga rnams kyang rin po
tshosna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ khom rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ 'dab ma rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ ma tog rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi
rang bzhin/ 'bras bu rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin no// kun dga' bo shing ljon pa de dag thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang/ sdong po dang/ yal ga dang lo ma dang/ 'dab
gam dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu rnams ni 'jam pa/ reg na bde ba/ dri zhim ba dag go/ rlung gis bskyod na de dag las snyan cing yid du 'ong
pa'i sgra 'byang sta/ mnyan pa dang mthun zhing mnyan pas chog mi shes pa'o// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rin po che so bdun gyi bshang len pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gisaM/
gang sa de mthar ni rin po che sna bdun gyi chu shing gi sdong po dang/ rin po che'i shing ta la'i 'phreng gis yongs su bskor to// thams cad kyang gsar gyi dra bas khebs pa'o/
kun tu'ani po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma rnams kyis khebs pa// da na pad+ma'i tshad dpag tshad phyed tsam yang yod/ dbag tshad kyi tshad tsam yang yod/ dpag tshad gcig dang//
gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhi dang/ lnga'itshad tsam yang yod/ dpag tshad bcu'i bar gyi tshad tsam dag kyang yod do// na po che'i bad+mathams cad wAkya'od zer bye ba
stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug 'byung ngo// 'od zer gyi rtse mo thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku gsar gyi kha dog can/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mapar ba bye ba
stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug 'byung// de dgashar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu gshegs nas sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin
[o/]dulho dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs dang/ 'og dang/ stang dang/ phyogs mtshams rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams grwa dad ba grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu gshegs
nas sems can rnams la chos ston to// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ri nag po rnams go med de/ ri thams cad kyang rin po che'i rig stagano/ ri'i
rgyal bo ri rab thams cad dang/ khor yug dang/ ri'i rgyal bo khor yug chen po thams cad dang/ rgya mtsho chen po rnams med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni kun tu mnyam pa//
nyams dga' pa/ lag mthal ltar mnyam pa/ sa phyogs rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis slas pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal chen bzhi'is kyi lha ra 'bakyi ngos la gnas ba dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa de dag
gang na gnas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di na ra'i rgyal po 'ib kyi gong ma 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang/ dga' ldan
dang 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'donadang/ tshangs chen nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams gang na gnas
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi rnam par smin pa dang/ las mngon par 'du bgyid ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'/
snyal ba/ kun dga' ba las kyi rnam par smin pa dang/ las mngon par 'du byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rid par rung gi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba
dang rdzu 'phrul dang/ byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sus kyayatha'a'am/ tshad rtogs ba 'am/ bsam par mi nus te/ gzhan dun sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis
ma khyab bo zhes lob tu 'byed do// de ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa'i bsod nams dang/ ye shes dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ 'byor ba bsag
gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'byung ngo// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag na de la dgos pa 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom ma mchis te/ bdag ni ma
rgyu 'ongs ba'i sems can rnams kyi dogs pa dang/ yid gnyis dang/ the tsem bsal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu'o// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' lags so legs so// de lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba yin no// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na chu klunga rnam pa sna tshogs
dag 'bab ste/ de na chu klung chen bo kha tshon dbag tshad tsam dag kyang yod/ dbag tshad bcu dang/ nyi shu dang sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu dang/ lnga bcu'i bar dang/ kha
tshon dbag tshad brgya stong gi tshad tsam dag kyang yod de/ zabs su ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa dag go/ chu klung de dag thams cad kyang sos dri rab tu zhim pa sna tshogs kyi rgyur 'apa'
rung ni bo che'amo tog sil ma'i tshogs dang 'bab kha dag go/ sgra dbyangs snyan pa tha dad ba sna tshogs dang yang ldan pa dag ge/ kun dga' bo chu klung chen po de dag las
lha'i glu'i dbyangs yan lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan pa'i sil snyan dag mkhas pa rnams kyis byas pa bas lhag pa'i sgra yad du 'ong ba 'byung ste/ chu klung chen bo do dag las rnag
ba 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ba ni zab pa dang/ kun shes bar bya ba dang/ rnam par shes par bya ba dang/ brdzun pa ma yin pa dang/ rna bar bde pa dang/ snying du
'ong ba dang/ dgo' bar bya ba dang/ snyan pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang/ mnyanapas chog mi shes pa dang/ mnyan pa dang mthun pa dang/ mi rtag pa dang//
zhi ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ mnyanan bde ba ste/ de dag sems can de dag gi rna ba'i dbang po la grag go/ kun dga' bo chu klung chen po de dag ka gram san
narin po che'i sros kyi shing ljon pa dag gis gang// de dag la yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ ma rtog dang/ dog pa sna tshogs 'byung ngo// de na
sems can gang dag chu klung 'gram de dag tu zang zing med pa lha'i dga' ba dang rtse ba myong bar 'dod pa de chu klung de dag tu 'jug ba'i tsho/ 'dod na chung lang bu nub tsam du gnas so//
'dod na pus mo nub tsam dang/ 'dod na rnyed pa nub tsam dang/ 'dod na mtshan kun nub tsam dang/ 'dod na med ba nub tsam du chu gnas bar gyur te/ lha'i dga' ba dag/
rgyu kyang 'byung ngo// degasems can gang dag tshu glang bar gyur dug snyam du 'dod na'ang de dag la bsil bar 'gyur ro// gang dag dro bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na'ang de dag la dro bar 'gyur ro//
gang dgo bsil ba dang dro bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na'ang/ de dag la chu de bsal ba dang dro bar 'gyur te bde bar 'gyur ro// chu klung chen bo de dag ni lha shang ta ma la'i lo ma dang/
zla a ka ru dang/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ rgyasos dang/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying bo dang/ spos mchog gis bsgos pa'i chus yongs su gang ste/ 'bab palha'i ma
tog ut+pa la dang/ bats+tshe dang/ ku mu ta dang/ pad+madakar bo dang/ drirab tu zhim pa dag gi me tog gis khebs pa/ khol khol dag na bya ngang pa dang/ bzhad dang/
[t ]khrung khrung dang/ ngur pa dang/ kan da pa dang/ de tsho dang/ ra skogs dang/ khu byug dang/ kun la dang/ ka la bang ka dang/ rmab la sogs pa'i sgra yid du
'ong ba dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pas sprul ba'i bya'i tshogs kyis bstan ba/ ngang pa dang ngang pa'i rgyal bo rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa dang/ 'babs sogs bod
ba D+ha 'dam rdza ba mad kha/ gsar gyi phye ma bdal ba dag go/ den gang gi tshisoms can de dag bdag nug gi bsam pa 'di'adra ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig snyam du 'dod pa
pa'i tshade dag ga khasam pa de lta bu dag chos dang ldan par yongs su rdzog b.la'agyuro/ kun dga' bo chu de las yid du 'ong pa'i sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa des sangs rgyas kyi
zhing der thams cad dang ldan ba la go bar byed do// de na sems can gang dgachu ngogs na 'khod pa dag sgra 'di bdag cag gi rna ba'i dbang bo la grogs bar ma gyur nug ces 'dod na/
da de dag gi lha 'i rna ba'i dbang po la gragapar ma 'gyur ro// gang sgra rnam ba lta bu thos bar 'dod pa de rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra yid du 'ong ba thos so// 'di lta sta/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra
dang / chos kyi sgra dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra dang/ ba rol tu phyin pa'i sa dang/ sa'i sgra dang/ stobs kyi sgra dang/ mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos re
'dres pa'i sgra dang/ mngon par shes ba'i sgra dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgra dang/ stong ba nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa
med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ ma skyes ba dang/ ma byung ba dang/ dngos bo med pa dang/ 'gag pa med ba'i sgra dang/ zhi ba dang/ rab tu zhi ba
dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying chen bo dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po'i sgra dang/ mi skyo ba'i chos la 'bod pa dang
dbang bskur ba'i sa rab tu thob pa'i sgra dag thos so// de sgra rnam ba de lta bu thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob go/ dban pa dang ldan pa dang/ 'dod chags
dang bral ba dang ldan pa dang/ zhi ba dang ldan pa dang/ 'gog pa dang ldan pa dang/ chos dang ldan pa dang/ byang chub yongs su 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung
ngo kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na ma dge ba'i ming yong yod do// sgrib pa'i sgra yong yod do// ngan song ngan 'gro rnam par ltung ba'i sgra'ang yong yod do// sdug
bsngal myasgra'ang gong mdado// kun dga' bo de nasdug bsngal yong ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i sgra'ang yod na/ sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi/
[e/]lta ga la yod/ kun dga' bo mdor pa skrun rnam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams bde pa can zhes bya sta/ rgyas pa ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo rgyas par byed na bskal pa ma
bskal ba las lhag ba zad zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'irgyu yongs su brjod kyang/ bde ba'irgyu de dag gi mtha' rtogs par ma nus so// kun dga' bo 'jig
rten gyi khams bde can der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang/ skye ba dang/ sa bag gyur ba de dgathams cad kyang gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ stobs dang/ mthu
dang chu zheng dang/ dbang dang/ bsod nams bsags pa dang/ mngon par shes ba dag dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ spyod mos tshal dang/ gzhal med khang
dang khang ba brtsogs pa yongs su spyad ba rnam pa de lta bu dag dang/ gzugs dang/ sbra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ rig bya yongs su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu dag dang/ long
srod dang los su sad pa rnam pa de lta burtsoms cad dang ldan te/ dbaran gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi sems
can dag kham gyis zla ba rags pa'i kha zas ma zako/ kha zas rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu 'byor ba nyid du shes te/ lus tsham bar 'gyur/ gzugs tshom por 'gyur/
ro// de dag yang lus la 'jug par mi byed do// de dag lus tshim nas spos kyi rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'i lha'i spos kyi rnam pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi
zhing thams cad bdugs par 'gyur ro// de na gang dri de la snom par mi 'dod pa de la sros dril dri'i 'du shes dang bsgos ba tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltar gong dag
sros dang/ 'brang ba dang byu ga pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan rnam pa ji lta bu dag 'dod pa de dag ga rnam
pa de lta bu de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad yongs su khyab par 'gyur ro// de dag gos kha dog tha dad pa/kha dog brgya stong du ma nu'adra ba 'dod pa de lta bu gos rin po che
dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad yongs su khyab par 'gyur zhing/ lus la bgos bar bdag nyid kyis shes so// dodag 'di lta ste/ mgo'i rgyan nam/ rna ba'i
rgyan nam/ mgul ba dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa'i rgyan 'di lta ste/ rtsod lan dang/ rnam dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ do shal dang/ sa mo de dang/
rnargyan dang/ sor gdub dang/ gsar gyitsango tshong dang/ ska rags dang/ gsar gyi dra ba dang/ mu tig gi dra ba dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bdang

[. ]rgyan ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam ba de lta bu'i rgyan rin po che brgya stong du mas sa pa dag 'di lta ste/ rin po tsho'i shing ljon pa la 'phyang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang par mthong ste rgyun
do dag bdag gas brgyan par yang shes so// de dag gang kha dog dang/ rtags dang/ dbyibs dang/ chu zheng ga bar dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ba gam brgyu
stong gis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i khri ka ras bcos bu sna tshogs btang ba/ sngas khro bo bzhag pa dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang ji lta bu 'dod ba de lta bu'i gzhal med khang de dag
de dag gi mdun du 'byung// de dag rin po che'i gzhal med khang grub pa de dag ga nang na/ lha'i bu mo bdun stong bdun stong gnyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'khod
de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do// 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang mi rnams tha dad ba mad de/ [” ]gzhan du na kun rdzob kyi tha snyad kyis lha dang ma zhes bya pa'i grangs su
'gro ba na ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mdun na ma ma rabs dang ma za ma na lham mo ma yin/ lhan na ma yin/ lhung
de ma yin zhing/ mi 'jigs pa ma yin la/ 'od gsal ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi mdun na/ lha'i dbang bo brgya byin yang 'di lta
sta skyed mos tshal dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ dbang dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ tsho'athul dang/ dbang phyug gis
lham e ma yin/ lhan na ma yin/ lha de ma yin te/ chos mngon par rtogs ba dang/ chos la yongs su spyod pa ni ma gtogs so/ kun dga' bo de la gzhan 'phrul
dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi 'dra ba de 'dra bar bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams blta bar bya'o/ kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na/ snga dro'i
dus nye bar gnas pa'itshe phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khrugs shing/ kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rlung ldang// de dag gis rin po che'i shing ljon pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa/ kha dog
thadad ba/ kha dog du ma yod pa/ lha'i spos dri rab tu zhim pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa de dag bskyod/ kun tu bskyod/ bsgul/ kun tu bskul nas/ de dag las me
tog rnam ba mang po yid du 'ong ba'i bsuphan/ blta na sdug pa dag ni po che'i sa chen po dIl 'brul te/ mo tog do dbagis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu ma 'grong bdun srid du
