bkram par gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu sa lam tog 'grogs mkhas pa zhig gis lag pa gnyis kas bkram sta/ mnyam par bkod na shin tu bkra zhing brtan
[so ]sdug go/ de bzhin du ma tog bsung dang kha dog tha dad pa dang ldan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu ma 'greng bdun tsam du khyab par 'gyur ro// ma tog gi rnam pa de dag ni
'jom pa ste/ dpa tsam du de na gos ka tsa lan da ltar reg na bde ba'o// de dag gi rkang pa 'jog pan sor bzhitsam gyis dma' bar 'gyur zhing/ rkang pa bdag ba na sor bzhi
tsam gyis mtho bar 'gyur ro// snga dro'i dus 'das nas ni me tog de dag kyang ma lus bar med pa 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dbon pa dang/ nyams dga'
ba dang/ dga' bar 'gyur zhing/ ma tog snga ma rnams kyis b.rogs ba med par 'gyur ro/ de nas yang phyogs bzhi kun nas rlung langs te/ gang sngon ma byang ba'i
ma tog gsar pa dag mngon par 'thor ro// snga dro ji lta bar nyi ma'i gung dang/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe dang/ mtshan mo'ang srod dang/ [”]nam gyi gung dang/ spo rangs kyang de
bzhin no// spos dri sna tshogs kyis bsgosaba'i rlung de dag langs nas/ sems can de dag la reg na 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa lta
bu'i de ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsnyad pa ma gtogs par ma dang dang/ nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ gatra'i
dang / rgyu skar dang/ skar ma'i gzugs dang/ mun pa mun nag gi ming du gdags pa yong med do// nyin mo dang mtshan mor btags pa'i ng lo nga med
do khyim yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes kyang yong med do/ kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na dus dus sulha'i spos chu'isin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo//
lha'i ma tog kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa dag dang/ lha'i rin po ches 'dun dang/ lha'i tsan gyi bla ma dang/ lha'igadugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyi char mngon
bar 'bab bo/ lha'i bla re dag kyang 'a ni to// lha'irin po che'i gdugs rdza ma'i bsil yab dang bcas pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'an to// lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag kyang
sgrogs shing/ lha'i bu mo dag kyang gar byed do/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang/ slob dang/ skya bar gyur pa de dag thams cad mya
ngan las 'das kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ni 'di lta ste/ mngos pa dang leg pa nyid du nges pa'i phung bo gnyis rnam par gzhag pa
'ag gdags pa med pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na rnam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can zhes bya ste/ rgyas par ni ma yin no/ kun dga' bo rgyas par
bstan na na bsal pa zad zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu rnams yongs su brjod kyang/ bde ba'i rgya de dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so/
de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sems can thams cad bde bar gshogs gyur la// dam ba'i don mkhas ye shes rnam dag
sa/ de dag bskal pa'i m 'on ta lhag par ni// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa rab rjod kyang// bsags pa'i'abrang ba rab tu brjod pa na// bskal ba bya ba de dag zad 'gyur gyi/
bde ba can gyi bsngags pa mthar ma phyin/ do dag sobs pa'i ng zad par 'gyur ma yin// gang gis phra rab rdul snyed 'jig rten khams// bshig cing btags te rdul du byas gyur
ba[}]de bas mang ba'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// rin chen bkang ste sbyin pakhyen pa ni// gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'od mtshan dang// bde ba can gyi yon tan khyad 'phag
rnams thos nas dga' ste thal mo sbyor byed pa// bsod nams 'di lor yang 'gyur ma yin// de lta bsan de bzhin gshegs de la// yon tan thos nas mgu dang dad
skyed la// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchogatu// 'gro bar bya phyir mos pa drag po skyed// gang gis bde ba can gyi'adzi rten gyi// ming thos ba ma bsod nams de la ni//
zhing mchog thag gru chen po de dag kun// chadang dpa yang 'gyur ba ma yin no// gang dag rgyal ba'i bka' dang shes rab can// de dag de bas bsod nams
mang du 'gyur// don dam thob phyir dad pa rtsa ba ste// de lta bas na thos nas pad gnyis sol// kun dga' bo'ajig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi yon tan dang bsngags ba de ltar
dbag tu yod do/ ku na dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi
bye ma sAd dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan yongs su brjod do// bsngags bo gsung ngo// grags pa ba tu sgrogs so// yon tan rdzod do//
da pa'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gang dag kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i mtshan thos la/ thos nas kyang tha na sams bskyed ba gcig tsam zhig bsam pa thag pa
nas dang ba dang ldan pas skyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogos ba'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo soms can gang dag kha cig/ de
bzhin gshegs pa de rnam pas yang dang yang yid la byed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dbag tu med pa skyed pa dang/ byang chub tu sems yongs su bsngos te/ 'jig rten
gyi khams der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa de dag 'chiba'i dus nye bar gnas ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de/
dge slong gi tshogs du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis boltas nas bzhugs par 'gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de mthong nas rab tu dang ba'i sems
kyi sha 'thos te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid du sku bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ 'gas kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gis tshe 'dinyid la de bzhin
gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong yang ci ma rung snyam dusems pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod la/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud kyis sangs
rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir sems yang dag par btang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya zhing// yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// kun dga' bo gang dag yang de bzhin
gshegs pa de'ong yid la byed cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa rgyun du skyod la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems yang dag par gtong ba de dag 'chi pa'i dusanye
bar gnas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ chuzhung dang/ zhabs
[d/ ]@#// 'bring ba dge slong gi dge 'dun tsa'adra ba de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyisngal ba dag mdun du gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas
ba tu dang ba 'damigs pa'i tipa 'dzin de dang/ brjod pa med pa'i dran pas naga'athAsi nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du sku par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo sogs can
gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de tha na sams bskyed pa gcig tsam rjes su dran par byed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar yong 'dod la/ chos zab mo dag 'chad ban
dga' ba 'thob ning sgyid lug pa med la/ mi 'gong ma zhum mang/ than sams bskyod ba gtsam de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag meng de yid la byed de/ 'dod pa'i ng
skyid na de dag sgrilam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dbag mad do mthong zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyabar 'gyur/ bla namadab 'ang dag par rdzogos ba'i byang chub las
phyir mi ldog bar yang 'gyur ro// kun dgar ba de bzhin gshegs pa de dgadon gyi dbang de gzigs nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan kyang yongs su rjod/ bsngags pa'i ng gsung/ bstod pa'i ng sgrogs so// kun dga' bo phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re
kha nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad dag/ de bzhin gshegs ba 'od dpag chod de la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bstan bkur bya ba dang/ yongs
su dri ba bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan gyi rgyun bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi
zhing der 'dong ngo/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das don 'di nyid rgyas par gsung zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyis
sangs rgyas la// phyag bya'i phyir ni shar gyi sangs rgyas zhing// mtha' yas gapa'i krung go dan// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags// de dag ma tog kha
dog tha dad pa// drizhim yang 'ong mang bo sAm thogs te// tshodapag chod balha dang miso mchodapa// mi yi 'dren pa mchog la ba tu'athor// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi
sangs rgyas la// phyag bya'i phyir na de bzhin lho nub dang/ byang phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams ji snyed nas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sams dpa' de dag lhags/ de dag sros
kyi kha dog tha dad pa// dri zhim padi 'ong mang bo sim thogs te/ tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa// mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor// byang chub sems dpa' mang
po de dag gis// mchod pa byas te dpag mda'od zhabasal// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas 'di skad du// sangs rgyas zhing na ngo mtshar mdzes shes
'dzer// dga' zhing mgu ba'isams ni gzhal yas kyis dedag sazhig tog sIm gtor nas// 'dren pa de yisan sngar 'di skad du// bdag cag zhing yang 'di re
gyur ces sas/ de dag ma tog snyim pa gtor ma thag/ de tshodapag tshad brgyaba'igags gyur te// legs par brgyan cing khu ba bkrabs mdzes// sangs rgyas skul/
kun tu khebs par nus// byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin du// bsnyen bkur byas nas 'ga' sa 'di skad du// gang dag gis ni mi mchog mtshan thos ba// sams
na de dag med pa legs red 'dzor// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir bdag cag lhags bas na/ bdag cag gis ni sngon tshud legs par rnyed/ bskal ba stong du ston pas gang bsgrubs
ba milam lta bu'i zhing ni'u 'dra ltos/ 'od ni rnabag med gza'arjid dpagacod kha/ sku tshe dbag med dge 'dun dpag med pa// byang chub sems dpas bskor cing mdzes
gyur pa// sangs rgyas bsod namaMs zung bo mchog la ltos// de nas tshe dbag med kyis 'dzum mdzad nas// 'od 'phro bye ba khrag khrig sum cu drug/ de dag zhal gyi dkyil
'khor nas phyung ste// zhing stong bye ba dag na khyab par mdzad// 'od 'phro de dag thams cad slar log ste// 'dren pa'i spyi gtsug dor ni nub par gyur// de tshe 'od 'phro nub par
gyur nas ni// lha dang mi rnams dga' ba rab tu skyed// de nas sangs rgyas sras bo grags chen bo// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de langs te/ gang slad 'jig rten
mgonabo 'dzum mdzad pa// bcom ldan de yi rgyu dang rkyen gang lags// sems can mang 'grol ban pa thugs brtse can// zho dmo mkhas pa de ni lung bstan sol// gsung
mchog yid du mang ba de thos nas// sems can dag ni dga' ba'i soms su 'gyur// 'jig rten khams mang byung chub sems dpa' dag/ sangs rgyas bal slad bde can 'dir
mchib// de dag thos nas dga' ba cher bskyang de// myur du zhing 'di rnam par lta bar 'gyur// rgya chen zhing 'dir lhags bar gyur nas kyang// lha yi mig dang lha pa rna ba dang//
tshar bas dran dang blo gros mkhas mchog dang// rdzu 'phrulaM stobs kyang myur du thob bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyis lung bstan pa// sa na sngon tshe smon lam 'di skad
btakha sems can dag gis nga yi ming thos na// nga yi zhing du rtag tu'ong bar shog/ nga yi smon lam bzang bo de rdzogs pas// 'jig rten khams mang dag nas sams
can 'ong// de dag nga yi zhing du lhags nas ni// de dag skye ba gcig las phyir mi ldog/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'dir// bdag gi
zhing khang 'di 'drar 'gyur ba dang// bdag gis ming dang sgra dang lta bas kyang// sems can mang bo sgrol bar bya 'dod pa// de ni myar du rings par l gor du// bde ba can
gyi 'dzig rten khams songalag/ 'od dpag med kyiganadu son nas ni// sangs rgyas bye ba stod la mchod pa gyis// rdzu 'phrulo sobs kyis zhing mang son nas nii sangs
rgyas bye ba mang la mchod byas te// bde bar gshegs la mchod pa byas nas kyang// dro khar bde pa can duslar yang 'ong// (bam bo gsum
ba ste tha ma'o// kun dga' bo dpazhin gshegs ba dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od da bgamod de'i byang chub kyi shing n 'bang du dbab
!tshad stong drug brgya yod pa/ yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'ab la dpag tshad brgyad brgya tshun chad du 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i sboms dang khrun dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/ ga
tulo tshachagasal/ rtag tul tog chags ba/ rtag tu 'bras bu chags kha/ kha dog tha dad pa/ kha dog brgya stong du ma yod ba/ lam tha dad pa/ ma togat+tha
00/ dad pa/ 'bras bu tha dad pa/ rgyunasna tshogs kyis brgyan pa// zla ba lta bur snang ba'i nor bu rin bo chos yongs su gsal ba/ brgya byin thogs ba'i nor bu rin
bo chas rnam par spras pa// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches gang pa// rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che mchog gas shin tu rnam par spras pa/ kha dog lha'i las 'das pa/
gser gyi skad pa 'phreng ba/ sa mo do mdzes pa dang/ 'ani bo che'i chun po dang/ rgyan 'phrang dang/ doshal mig rgyan dang/ mu tig dmar po'i rgyan 'phreng dang
mu tig sngon po'i rgyan 'phrang dang/ seng ge 'i kha nas 'byung ba'i ska rags kyi tshogs yod pa/ rin po che'i skud ba dang/ rin po che thams cad dang/ dung gis
mngon par spras pa/ gsar gyi dra ba dang mu tig gi dra ba dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi dra ba dang/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas bla rer bris pa/ chu srin dang/
bkra shis ba dang/ g.yung drung ba 'khyil ba dang/ zla gam lta bu s legs par brgyan pa/ nor bu 'khrol ba dang/ gsor dang/ ni po che'i rgyan thams cad kyisu0f8brgyun
brda sems can gyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par brgyan pa'o// kun dga' bo byang chub kyi shang de rlung gas bskyod na/ sgra dbyangs 'byung ba gang yin pa
des 'dzayi rten gyi khams tshad med pa go bar byed do// kun dga' bo de la byang chub kyi shing bas de sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag byang chub kyi
mtha'i bar du rnand kyis ma btab par shes bar bya'o// mas can dpag tu med/ grangs tshad/ bsam gyis ma khyab/ mtshus pa med/ gzhal du med/
tshad med/ brjod du mang ba gang dag gi mig lam du byang chub kyi shing de sbyang ba de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du mig nad kyis ming btab par shes par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems
can gang dag byang chub kyi shing sogs dri tshor ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha' bar dunam yang sna nad kyis mi btab bar shes par bya'o// sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shang de'i 'bras bu'i
romyong ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lcenadakyis ma btab par shes pa bya'o// byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sems can gang dag la khyab par gyur pa de dag kyang byang
chub kyimatha'i bar du nam yang lus la nad kyis ni btabalar shes par bya'o// kun dga' bsems can gang dag byang chub shing de chos nyid du nges bar soms pa de dag kyang de nas
bzung sta/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar dunam yang sems mi g.ya nga bar shes par bya'o// sems can de dag thamasacad na byang chub kyi shing de mthong ma gtubla na med pa yang
[z/ ]da ga par rdzogs yal ba'akhas pa ba'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ra 'gyur ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ sngon gyi rgyal
ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang/ sngon gyi son lam dang spyod pa shanitu rdzogs pa dang/ shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ mi nyung ba dang/ ma tshang ba med pas 'di lta sta/ sgra'i
rjes su 'gro ba dang/ rjes su mthun ba dang/ mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod ba dang/ badrod ba rnam pa gsum 'athob go/ kun dga' bo byachub sems dpa' gang dag sangs
rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa dang/ skyab dang/ skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad skya ba gcig gis gos bar gyur nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur to/ smon lam gyi dbang ni ma gtogs so/ byang chub sems dba'ade dag ni sang ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa// go tshargya chen po bgos pa
sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon bar brtson pa sha stag go/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'od 'dom gang
pa sha stag go/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'od dbag tshad bye ba brgya stong pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rgyan
[Bes/ ]@#// mi 'chad par kher zug tu snang bas khyab bar byed pa gnyis ni ma gtogs so/// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di ska
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byachub sems dba'asams dpa' chen bo de gnyis kyi ming ci zhis bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo do gnyis las gcig gi yang
ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o// gcig ga gangan mthu chen lo ces bya ste/ kun dga' bo deganyis nas nigs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos
sa sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes so/ kun da ga' 'khyodachub sems dpa'o gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhi der rgyas pa de dag thams cad na/ skyes bu chen po 'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan ba/ lus
longs su rdzogs pa/ bsam gtan dang mngon par shes ba la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas ba/ dbang bo rnob/ dbang bo bsdams ba/ kun shes ba'i dbang po dang ldakha/
rgyu ga zhumakha/ dbang po mi g.yo ba/ bzod pa thob pa/ yon tan mtha' yasamu med pa sha stag go kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad ni

sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du log par mi phyung ba'i chos tshan sha stag ste/de dag thams cad 'di nas nye bar bzung nas/ nam yang babs ma dran par ma 'gyur gyi tshor
0 dran bar 'gyur te/ gang dag dbar nad ltar gyi nga bzhin du snyigs ma'i dusan/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bskal pas dkrugs pa dag tu
gan par ston smon lam btab pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad snga dro gcog bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams
gzhan dag tu dong nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma la bstan bkur byed de/ de dag rnam ba 'di lta bu'i ma tog dang/ bag pa dang/ mar ma dang/ spos dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/

phyi ma dang/ gos dang (gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan dang/ glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag gis mchod pa bya'o snyam du ji lta ji ltar sems skyed cing/ ji snyad 'dod
ba rnams de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad lag pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis ma tog nas rol mo'i ribyangs skya'i
bar de dag gis sangasas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mchod ba byed l/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po tshad med grangs med pa dag kyang skad cing sogs so// gal te ma tog gi skon bu rnam pa 'di lta'u
lag ba nas byung bar gyur cig ces 'dod na'ang/ de dag gis sems bskyed mthag tu lha'i me tog kha dog tha dad pa// dri tha dad pa/ dri ma yod pa'i skon bu dag lag pa nas byung ste/ de dag gis
skon khu'i ma tog rnam pa de lta bu de dag sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la'athor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon bar rab tu 'go'agro// skon bu'i ma tog gtor ba de
dag thams cad las nang gi chung du gang na ba de'ang stongagi bar snang la dpag tshad bcu'i tshadatsam gyin tog ga u0f7aga dugs su gyur te/ phyim shes ma gtor gyilar dusnga ma sa la ltung bo// de na
son khu'i ma togagator ba gang stong gi bar snang la dpag tshad nyiba'i tshad mgyi gdugs su gyur ba'ang yod/ dngag tshad sum cu dang bzhi bcu'i tshad tsam yang yod/ stong gi bar snang la ma tog

dgi gzugs dpag tshad brgyad stong gi tshad kyi bar tsam du gyur ba dag kyang yong do// dan gangadag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyid cing/ sams dga' ba rgya chen po ba pa de dag dge ba'i
rtsa ba grangs med dag tu mad pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang bo la bsnyen bkur byas te/ snga dro gcig la slor lag nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du gnas so//

com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs kha tshodapag med de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su zin ba dang/ sngon chos mnyan pa byin pa dang sngonagyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod ba dang/
sngon gyi snyan lam byongang yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ ming ba dang/ shin tu rnam par phub dang/ shin tu bsgoms pasasmon lam btab pa grub bo// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs

[c/]rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bar gyur pa de dag thams cad na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba dag go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes 'ga'/
yang a skyid do// de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun tu 'chag cing rnam par sgrub na dga' ba dang mi dga' lam skyed do// 'gro ba nang ltos pa med pa nyid du 'gro'o/ ltos pa dang bcas pa
ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ dngos bo yongs su 'dzan pa dang/ gnas kyisams dang/ sems de lta bu dag de dag la yong yod do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rtenagyi khams
bde ba can der skyes ba de dag la gzhan gyi 'du shes med/ rang gi 'dushes mod/bdag gi 'du shes med 'thab la med/ rtsod pa med/ mi mthun pa yod/ mi mnyam pa ni sems med de/ de dag ni
sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang/ phan pa'i sems dang/ byams pa'i soms dang/ mnyan pa'i sems dang/ 'dzam ba'i sems dang/ dge ba'i sems dang/ rab tu da nga 'is/
dang brtan bsam sa dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i sams dang/ 'khrugs pa med pa'i soms dang/ rtog pa med pas mas dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bslad ba srid pa'i soms dang/
sems kyirgyud sgyu ma'i rang bzhinal blo rab tu zhugs pa/ shes pa rgya mtsho chen po dang mnyam pa/ blo rib dang mtshungs pa/ yon tan du ma bsags ba/ byang chub skyo yan los yang dag par 'gro
bas rnam par rtsen pa/ sangs rgyas yang dag par 'grol mngon par brtson pa/ sha'i mig rab tu rnam par 'byed ba lha'i wa/mngon par bsgrub pa/ shes rab kyi mig
ba gas bar khong du chud kha/chos kyi mig gi yalol tu son pa/sangs rgyas kyi na babatsari'achad deston la/ rgyatser yang dag par rab tu ston cing chags pa chudaba'i ya shisamtshan bar bsgrub pa/
khams gsum mnyam pa nyid du mngon bar brtson pa/ sems dul ba/ soms 'kho/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa/ kun 'byung ba'i nges ba'i tshig la mkhas pa/ chos kyi se ba'i
gi dad ldan pa/gsal ba dang mi gsal ba la mkhas la/ tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i gnas la mkhas pa/'jig rten pa'i gtam la mi lto bar gnas pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam rnamA
sa snying po rtogs pa chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la mkhas kha/chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nyo bzhi bar shes pas gnas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i spyod yul ba/'damad pa/lenab
mdab/soms pa med pa/ bung po med pa/ len pa med pas shin tu rnam par grol ba/nyon mongs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams la thug pa med par gnas pa/ rtsa ba med b gnas pa/sems
chags la ched ba/ zhum pa med pa/chos zab mo rnams la mngon par brtson pa/sgyid lug ba mod la/ sangs rgyas kyi la shes rtogs par dka' ba la 'jug pas 'phags pa/ bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam
00 rjes su thob pa/the tsom mad pa/dog pa las rgal ba/shes pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa/ ye shes kyis mngon par 'phags te rab dang mtshungs ba/ 'khrugs pa med pa'i

blo rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba/ shes rab kyi 'od dang/ dkar zhing shin tu dkaral dga'i dge ba'i soms dang/ gser btsoma'i kha dog dang 'dra ba snang zhing 'od 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi mchog gis nye zla'i sazhi
tu'adas pa/sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba bzed bas sa dang mtshungs pa/nyon mongs pa'i drim 'khru bar 'bab pas chu dang 'dra ba/chos M thams cad la rlom sems su byed pa dang nyon
mongs pa srog ba'i phyir me'i rgyal po dang mtshungs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la ma chags pa'i phyir rlung dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad nges par thigs pa dang thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i phyir nam
mkha'i dang mtshungs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos ba'i phyir pad+madang 'dra ba/ chos dang chos ma yin pa mngon par sgrogs pas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'brug chen po dang mtshungs ba/chos
kyi chu'i char mngon par 'babs bas char ba chen po dang 'dra ba/ tshogs chen po zil gyis gnon pas khyu mchog dang mtshungs ba/ sams shin tu mchog tu dul bas glang bo che chen po dang 'dra ba/
shin tu dul bas rta cang shes bzang bo dang mtshungs pa/rtsal dang ma 'jigs pas skrag pa med pa'i phyir ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge dang 'dra ba/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyobs pas/ shing ga
rgyal bo nu grod+hadang mtshus pa/phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis ma g.yos pas mi'i rgyal po ri rab dang 'dra ba/ byams pa tshad med pa bsgoms bas nam mkha' dang mtshungs
ba dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i sngon du 'gro bas tshangs pa chen po dang 'dra ba/ gnas su sogs pa med pas bya dang mtshungs pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rnam par 'joms las
bya'i rgyal bo nam mkha' lding dang 'drab/ 'byung bar dka' ba'i phyi'i u dum wa la tog dang mtshungs ba/ rgya mtsho ltar shin tu mnyam par gzhag kha/ rnam par g.yo ngab mad pa/ dbang bo rgyugs la
chod ba/ rnam par gtan la 'bebs bu la mo bas ba/ bzod ba dang des pa mdab/ba rol phun sum tshogs par smon pas phrag dog med pa/ chos kyi gtam rnams la 'jigs pa med pa/chos 'odra

su tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba/ tshul khrims kyis bi 'dang 'drab/thos pas rin bo ma'i 'byung gnas dang mtshungs pa(chos kyi rnga sgra chen pos sgra snyan pa/ chos kyi rnga chen po rdung ba/chos kyi dung chen po

'bud pa/chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgrung ba/ chos kyi ba dan chen po 'dzazhipa/ chos kyi sgron mo chen po rab tu 'bar bar byed ba/ shes rab kyis rnam par lta ba/ rmongs pa med pa/ zhe sdang med pa/tha ba
tul kha/ ga pa/ dri nga ba med pa/ brkam pa med pa/ yang dag par 'gyed pa la dga' ba/gtong ba btang pa/sbyin pa la lag brkyang ba/chos dang zang zing yang dag par 'gyed ba la dga' ba/sbyin ba la
00sol stsa med ba/'dres pa med pa/ yid 'jigs pa med pa/chags pa med pa/ brtan pa/ dba' ba/ gces bar 'anipa/mos pa dang ldan pa/ ngo[%]shes pa dang ldan pa/ zug rngu phyub/gtan ba med
ga/mngon par shes pa thob ba/ desab/ 'grogs na bde ba don byed ba/ lag rten gsal bar byed pa/ 'dren pa/ dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang/ rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro bo sbangs ba/dag pa/
mya ngan dang bral ba/ drim med pa/ dri ma gsum sangs ba/ mngon bar shas bas rnam par rtsen ba/ rgyu'i stobs can/ smon lam gyi stobs can/ mi dman pa/gya gyu med pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag

khrig brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed ba/ ngargyal gyi sbug chu bton ba/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang khral kha/ dag ba/ dge ba la mos pa/ rgyal ba dam pas bsngags pa/'jib
na mkhas ba/sbyangs pa'i shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ rgyal bas bstod pa/ sems dga' ba dang ldan ba/ brtul pod pa/ sran thub pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ rdul med pa/

'dus pa/rgya che ba/ khyu mchog tu gyur ba/ bden pa sakhablo dang ldan ba dran pa dang ldan pa/ blo gros dang ldan pa/rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi mtshon cha'i lag cha can/bsod nams dang ldan pa/

'od dang ldan pa/tha bo dang/ dri dang/ khong khro ba dadebral la/chos la rtag tu brtson pa/ chos thams cad la thos ba rgya mtsho lta bur gyur pa sha stag go/ kun dga' bo mdor bsdu na sangs rgyas kyi zhing
tha @#// de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu sha stag go/ rgyas par bya nagal te de bzhin gshegs pa tsho tshad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas bas bstan kyang/
skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan gyi mtha' bstan par mi nus la/ de bzhinagshegs ba'i ma 'jigs pa'i ng rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ byang chub sem
dba' de dag gi yon tan rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi spobs pa bla na med pa de gnyis ka'ang bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo longs la nub
phyogs su phyogs te/ ma tog gtor la thal mo sbar te/ gang na bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med shul med cing rnam par
dag pa bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes shing chos kyang ston pa'i phyogs der phyag tshol cig/ de'i mtshan de'ang sgrib pa med bar phyogs bcur grags te/ phyogs re re na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
gsung chags pa mi mnga' zhing gsung thogs pa ma mnga' ba gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma snyad dag la 'galan go' ma yin par bsngags pa brjod cing bstod de sAn ba gsung ngo// de skad ces bka'
stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/tshodang ldan po kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ]

[j]ba'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de dang/ tshodapag mod de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag la lta tshul
lo tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig 'di sbas ma thag tu donas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i phyag gi mthil nas 'od gang gis sangs

rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong snang bas khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od byung ngo// de nas de'i tshosangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong thams cad na nag po 'am/ rin po che'i ri 'am/ lcan bo 'am/ lhun po chon po
'am/ btang rung ngam/ btang zung chen po 'am/khor yug gam/ khor yug chen po 'am/rtsi ga pa 'am/ ka ba'am/ shing ljon pa stug po 'am/ skyed mos tshal lam/ gzhal med khang ya/ rtswa dang mi gang
su dag yod pa de dag thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'a'od kyis thal bar gyur cing/ zil gyis non par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma shar nas ma zhig 'dom gang tsam na 'dug

bal mi zhig lta ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe 'ad lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang 'od de yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsAnadang/ dge bsnyen ma dag dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin

dang / dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang/ mi ma yin pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ri'i rgyal po'idabaltar/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags te/ phyogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/
lhan ne/ lhang nger mdzes pa de dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen bo dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dza lta'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po 'di chugacig tu gyuran/
dal shing ljon pa rnams mod/ ra rnams med/ gling rnams med/ rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ nadang/ nags tshal rnams med/ chu klung nags med rung/ ngam grog dang g.yang sa rnamA

mi snang ste// gzhan du na sa chen po rgya mtsho/cig tu gyur pa na ma gtogs so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos rnams kyi lus las mngon bar grub pa'i 'od 'dom gang ba dang/ byang chub
sams dpa' rnams kyi 'od dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong yod pam gtogs bar gzhan rtags sam mtshan ma cung zad kyang med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med des/nyan thos kyi tshogs de dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de zal gyis mnan nas/ phyogs thams cad du gsal bar kun tu snang bo/de'i tshe 'jig rten
gyi khams bde ba can der/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ lha dang mi de dag thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang/ de bzhin gshegs/
[.]bshAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pos bskor cing chos ston pa'i ng snang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la
bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang/ stang ga bar snang la kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dag dang/ nags tshal nyams//

dga' ba dag dang/ skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag dang/ chu klung dang rdza nga bu nyams dga' ba dag dang/ rin po che'i ma tog pad+madang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar pos gang ba dag dang/ 'og tusa'i stong
nas bzung ste/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi nam mkha'i ngos la me tog bkram pa dang/ ma tog ga'aphrang bas kun tu mdzes par byas pa dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ka pa'i 'phreng bas gang ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i bya sna tshogs kyis bstan pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'di
las gzhan pa'i bu'i tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgras go bar byed cing/ des byang chub sems dpa' de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur ba dag mthong ngam/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi pham pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dani sems can 'di dag gzhal med khang dpag tshad brgya stong yod
pa dag tu zhugs te/ bar snang la chags pa med pa 'gro ba dag kyang mthong ngam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
ba mi pham ba 'di jisnyam du sems/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes pa'i mi rnams tha dad du bya ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
bdag bas na bi dad du bgyi ba gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong s/'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i ma rnams ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'i bar du lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
sul pa/ mi pham pa khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde pa can de na ma bcig bats+tsha chen po dag gi mngal na gnas ba mthong ngam/ gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dperan sum cu rtsa gsum
nga 'thab bral gyi lha rnams gzhal med khang dbag tshad lnga bcu pa las/ dpag tshad brgyab 'am/ dbag tshad lnga brgya pa rnams su zhugs te rtse dag la 'ang dga' mgur sod pa de bzhin du bcom ldan
'das bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi kha cig pad+machen bo dag gi mngal na gnas par mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das de na sems can rdzus te 'byung ba gang dag bats+tsha rnamA
la skyil mo krung bcas te 'byung ba dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kha cig pad+ma'i mngal na gnas pa dang/ kha cig pad+mal skyil mo krung bcas nas rdzus te 'byung ba de'i rgyun lags/ rkyen
[re]/ ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi pham pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na gnas te/ the tsom du lhung pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten gyi khams/

bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skad pa de dag ni de na mngal na gnas so// gang dag spo tsam med cing som nyi chad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir//
dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams skad lo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes chags ba mad pa la yadi ches shing dad la mos pa de dag ni pad rnams la skyil mo krung bcas nas rdzus te 'byung ngo// mi
bam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na gnas pa gang dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag mang lta
ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya bar sems skad rlung/ the tsom mi skyod la/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la som nyi med rung rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang sogs pa de dag ni skyil
mo krung bcas nas rdzus te 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/dbor na byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas ring po ma lon pa gzhan dag dang 'dra bar yud tsam gyis lus rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro// ma pham pa

shes rab kyi khyad par dang/ shes rab kyi rim pa dang/ 'di lta sta/the tsom du lhung ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams shing/ byang chub sems dpa'
mthong ba dang/ chos nyan pa dang/ chos kyi gtam dang/ dge ba spyod ba dang/ dge ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad las yongs su nyams pa'i shes pa ngo sa su nyams pa dang shes

ba chung ba la ltos/mi phama'adi ltas/dpon rgyal bo rgyal rigs sa bonas dbang bskur la/khri mon gsar dang ku zla thams cad kyis spras pa/dar dang/ 'breng ba dang/ lnga ldi'i tshigs dpyangs pa/tshon sna tshogs kyi

bla re bros pa/ras bcos bu bting ba ma tog gi sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/bdug porgya chen pos bdugs kha/khang bzangs dang/ bsil khang dang/ sa khung dang/ kha khyer dang/ rtababs dang/ bgam ni bo che sna

tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/gsar dang 'di bo che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i drab khres pa/gru bzhi lham pa/ka ba bzhi zug pa/sgo bzhi gtod ba/thom skas bzhi bcas pa zhig yod la/rgyal po de'i yu nyes pa zhig gi

phyir khri mon der bcug ste/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar rgya khong sgril du bcug la/ der ded 'i khri bshams te/stan go na ka bting la/bar tshangs can dang pa la li ka bting//yul ka ling sa kyi pa ti ba bting la/po'i

stod du dar bting// g.yas g.yon gnyis su tan ma dmar po bzhag ba/bkra ba/bltan sdug pa de la 'dug kyang rung/ nyal yang rung/ de'i zas skom gtsang ma bsod ba rnam pa mang po du ma btaglangs na/ mi pham pa de

dzisnyam du sams/ rgyal po'i bu de yos su sbyang ba rgya che ba yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rgya chalags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi pham pa 'di dzisnyam du sems des de'i ri myangs byed
[j]dam mid par byed dam/ des dga' ba 'thob bam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de na ma lags te/ nongs pa gang gi slad du rgyal pos khri mon der stsal ba de las thar par 'tshal zhing/ rigs bzang po
rigs bzang po'i gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag dang/ khams kyi rgyal bo 'am gang gis khri mon de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur
ba yongs su tshol te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu de btson ra de na dga' ba ma mchis shing/ rgyal pos ma gnang gi bar du ma thar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi
pham pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag the tshom du ltung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi yo shes mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes la som nyi za ba de dag sangs
rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa do dang/ sams dang ba tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyo'ang pad+ma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas shing rdzus te 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ pad+ma rnams kyi
mngal na gnas pa myong ste/ de dag de la skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang du du shes shing gnas te/ bshang gci mad/ mchil ma dang snabs med/ yid dang mi mthun
pa mi 'byung mod kyi/[”]lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ chos nyan pa dang/ byang chub sems dbar mthong ba dang/ 'bel ba'i chos kyi ga ka sa pa dang 2 dge
ba'i chos srid pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te/ de dag de na mngon par mi dga' zhing mgu ba mi 'thob kyi/ sngon gyi nyis pa zad nas de dag pad+ma'i mngal rnams
nas 'byung ste/ de dag de nas byud mang stang a/ 'og gam/ thad kar byung ba mi shes so// mi pham pa 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po 'al bsnyan bkur

bya ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang bo grangs med tshad med/ dpag tumed ba dag bskyed par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar bya ba de thams cad kyang the tsom tha ba'i nyes pa
bsgrubs par ma gyur pa la ltos/ma pham pa the tsom gyis byang chub sams dpa' rnams la gnod pa chen po ji tsam du 'gyur ba la ltos/mi pham pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dag gis the tsom longs

su spos te/ byang chub tu sams bskyed la myur du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i stobs bskyod pa'i mthu thob par bya ba'i phyi'i/ gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gan nas ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mi pham ba byang

chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde pa can du skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang bo la
dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par yongs su 'grub na/dge ba'i rtsa ba de bas chung du rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
bye ba khrag khrig phrag bco brgyad 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i gan
nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i 'od kyi gnanas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa
gnyis 'dzag can gyi khams bde ba can du skyo bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dpag med kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten sgron ma'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa klu
zil gyis gnon pa'i gnanas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drugatsurtsa bzhi 'ag rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs ba rdul bral
'od kyi son nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge 'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad
stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs kyi gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'jig rten gyi khams
bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang po'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu'ajig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
gshegs ba stobs mngon par shes pa'i gnanas/ byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan du skyo bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ma tog rgyal mtshan gyi gan
nas/byad chub sems dbang brtson 'grus thob pa/ 'jug ba gcig gis yang dag bzhugs la/ nyi ma brgyad pa gcig gis bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i 'khor babasnyil
zhib bye ba phrag nyi shu lnga'ajig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur go/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i bdag po'i ginanas/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams/
bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'jigs pa bar s pa'i gan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dbag med la blta ba dang/
phyag bya ba dang/ bsAn bkur bya ba dang/ yongs su dri ba dang/ yongs su dri bar byabs pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// ma bam pa rnam grangs de lta bu s de bzhin/
gshegs pa gang dag ga gonanas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rtenagyi khams bad ba can du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur
bya ba'i phyir 'dong ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga mtshan bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig tshang par brjod kyang mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// mi pham pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi mtshan thos pa'i sogs can de dag red pa ji snyed cig legs par red pa la ltos/ sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de
la tha na sems dad pa gcig tsam red pa dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa ma phud pa de dgan dman pa la mos par ma 'gyur ro// ma pham ba de lta bsan khyod chos par bya/ khyod kyi
khong du chud par bya ste/ lha dang bcas pa dang/ bdud dang bcas pa dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas ba dang/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang/ banus pa dang/ bklag ba dang/ kun chub par bya ba dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgyatshor yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang/
za bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// mi pham ba chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin gazhag gtsagi tsam yang bzung zhing bcangs te/ bklags shang kun chub par byas la/ bsam
ba thag pa nas gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// than glegs bam la legs par bris te bcang bar bya zhing/ de la ston pa'i'adu shes kyang bskyed par
bya'o// gang zhig sems can dbag tu med pa dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la dgod pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
mad do la blta ba dang/ bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod ba phun sum tshogs ba khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa des chos kyi rnam grangs
'di mnyan pa'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mas yongs su gang ba las brgal te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o// thos nas kyang g.yor ma lhung
ba'i rgyud kyis bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su dga' bar bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'dagazung ba dang/ kun chub par bya ba dang/ bcang ba dang/ yi ger bri ba dang/
[4 ]bsgom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rlabs po che chen po brtsam par bya'o/ tha na ba ga rug 'jos pa de srid du'ang gzhan dag la brjod par bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i/
'jig rten gyi khams mos yongs su gang ba des brgal nas kyang/ 'gyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyod par ma khya'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi pham pa/
'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma dag chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di mnyan cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
phyir mi ldog pa'i phyi'i ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i bar du chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po rnam pa 'di lta bu/ sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po
myur du grub ba 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa'i sems can de dag ni rid pa shitu legs par red cing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa dang/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas
pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob pa dang/ 'dzan
[s// ]@#// pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub khar byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston ba dang/ bsgom
ba la dga' bar 'gyur pa dang/ tha na yi ger bris te mchod pa byed pa de dag kyang bsod nams mang du skyed bar 'gyur te/ de bgrang bar sla ba ma yin no// ma pham ba de
ltar na sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad ba de byas pa yin te/ khyod kyang de la chod par brtson bar gyis shig/ sangs rgyas kyi yi shes chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la
som nyim za zhig/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i na bo'i brtson 'ar chud du re/ mi pham pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba red bar dka'o// chos bstan ba red
bar dka'o// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa red par dka'o// ma pham pa ngas khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsnyad kyis da khyod kyis mngon par
sbyor la sgrubs shig/ mi pham ba chos kyi rnam gras 'dachud ma za bar bya ba'i phyi'i yongs su gtad ba chen po bya'o/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mi nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyis
shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ma 'khrugs par gyis shig/ yun ring por gnod ba dang/ mi phan ba dang/ mi bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ log
de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gas su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bsod nams dag na ma byas pa/ 'di 'dra 'di dag thos
mi 'gyur// dpa' bo gang dag don grub pa// de dag gsung 'di thos par 'gyur// gang gas 'od mdzad 'jig rten mgon// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas ni//
gus dang bcas pas chos thos pa// de dag dga' ba dam pa 'thob// lta ba can dang dman dang zhum rnams kyis//sangs rgyas chos la dad pa rnyed mi nus// gang dag sngon gyi
gsargyas mchod byas pa// de dag 'jig rten mgon gyi srung la slob// dper na skyes bu long ba mun kha na// lam yang ma shes bstan par ga la nus// de ltar nyan thos
thams cad sangs rgyas kyi// ga shes mi rtogs sems can gzhan kyi smos// sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas yon tan mkhyen// lha klu lha min gnod sbyin nyan thos min//
sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu bshad pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang 'di ma yin// gal te sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs shes rnam dag don
dam mkhas gyur te// de dag bskal pa'i m 'on te lhag par ni// sangs rgyas gcig ga yon tan rjod byed kyang// de dag bar du mya ngan 'das gyur gyi// bskal pa
bye ba mang bor rab brjod kyang// sangs rgyas gshes tshad red ma 'gyur te// de ltar rgyal ba yi shes ngo mtshar to// de bas mkhas ba rig pa'i
rang bzhin/ gang zhig nga yatshig la yid ches te// rgyal ba'i ye shes phung po dbang byas te// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen ces tshig tubarjod/ brgya lam na nam yi lus
la// brgya lam na ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur// dad dang shes yun ring red bar 'gyur// de bas donathob bya phyir brtson 'grus skyed// gang zhig chos
mchog 'di 'dra thos nas ni// bde gshigs dran po dga' kha thob par 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub mos skyod pa// de dag 'das pa'i dus na ngad dang bshos/
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can bye ba phrag bcu gnyis chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam pa'i dag go/ bye ba
phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhisan phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob go/ dge slong brgyud ban len pa med par lag ba rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
rtsalnga namo glu ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha dang mi'i skyo dgu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcun sngon sogs spyod ba las blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba dang/ phyag khyab dang/ bsan bkur bya ba'i phyir bde ba can du sku bar
dag kha rtsa ba rnams yo ngas su sngo bar byed do// de dag thams cad der skyes nas kyang mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshags pa 'jam ba'i dbyangs zhes bya bar blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
ba marag mad las bzod pa thob// blun mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khragi phrag brgyad cu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
med kyi sngon byang chub sams dba'i slad pa spyod ba na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ikhyadachub tu longs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes te/ sngon
gyi smon lam dang spyod ba yongs su rdzogos par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam ba drug tu g.yos te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs
dag kyang kun tu snang ngo// me tog man da ra ba dag kyang sa la pus mo nub tsam bkram par gyur to// lha dang mi'i sil snyan rnams kyang rab tugrag par gyur to// 'og/
migyi gnas kyi bar du'ang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra grags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ring/
lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcos ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/
'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgyupa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi bkod ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzan ma tra dang/ dAn shA la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur rung zhus te/ skad
gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ 'a ga dgu brgya sta bam po gsum mo//
[युगमा लगेगा]
